However, like the others, they have a nice gingery taste, here subordinated by the peanut butter, they're nice and chewy and they're not overly sweet, It's a good candy, and if you like peanut butter you might really enjoy the chews.

Gary Peterson

Arrived in a box, box ok, flowers "gangrene" would be a nice and repeateabe discription. The flowers could have been picked along any trail in South America. they held up from the box to the vase and there expired. A small funeral was held.

I purchased this product for my daughter with multiple food allergies.  The ingredients listed were all things she could have.  Unfortunately, the ingredients list is inaccurate.  I checked both amazon's list and the ingredients list on the company website.  Neither listed citric acid, which can be a corn derivative, but it was listed on the box when I received it.  Corn is one of my daughter's allergens, so I could not feed her this product without knowing the source of the citric acid used.  I have tried calling the company for a week and keep being told an ingredients specialist will call me back, but they NEVER do.  I have written the company via the contact us form on the website, but no one will contact me to give me the information I need to know.  Fortunately, amazon.com was very helpful and issued me a refund, but Bremner cannot be trusted if you have food allergy questions.  I am very upset at the lack of concern from this company.  Those with corn allergies or citric acid sensitivities should not purchase this product.  The ingredients list really needs to mention this!  I will not purchase any Bremner products in the future.

Summary: These are GRAPE tootsie pops, not red raspberry
Text: Tootsie roll pops are great to have around or to send as a gift - but BEWARE - read the "small print".  These are GRAPE!!

my best friend introduced white pepper to me

so i went online and tried to get her others for her to try
i liked the fact that she used up this one (meaning she loved this one best)

liek the description says, its like regular pepper, with a touch of sweetness
i hate the fact though that they are so light it is impossible to use a peppermill with them. you are almost forced to just eat them whole
My dog goes absolutely crazy for these dog treats, so he gives them a four paws up. Will definitely get them again.

Dear Coffee snobs, if you want real cappucino, you bought the wrong coffee maker. Considering that you did, be happy with this selection, as its actually VERY Tasty compared to any of the other Cappucino K Cup knock offs. Its the only one I'll buy.
This is my second favorite after the breakfast in bed flavor. I love Wolfgang Puck coffee. It's a little bolder then the breakfast in bed, but still smooth.

I switched to this food when my persian cat was diagnosed with Lower Urinary Tract disease.  The high moisture content of this food aided in curing my cat (with only nutritional changes!).  My cats love all of the flavors, but one of them is allergic to tuna, so now I only feed them the paw lickin' chicken.  They won't touch any other brand of canned food now! The food is also very high quality--it contains no grains (cats are obligate carnivores--feeding them grains is ridiculous), no by-products, free-range meat, nothing artificial, and the cans are BPA-free! I highly recommend this food.
I've ordered these dates several times now and have never been disappointed. I never really liked dates until I tried Medjools - they're the best!
It is nice to have something a bit different than the bottled grocery store catsup.  This goes well on burgers and hot dogs.

Summary: Great price does the job for dishwasher
Text: Got this aft learning the main ingredient for lemishine,  I add a little of this to my dishwasher with the detergent in each wash and the dishes come out sparking. No more white calcium film.  And sooo much betterr price than all the products out there!
I had this at a friends house and loved it so much I immediately went out to my local grocery store and bought a bottle. I love it and it is a new staple in our home.

Summary: Not at all what I expected.
Text: I did not want an extra bold coffee. This is not listed as extra bold, but that is what arrived at my door. Stuck with it, I've been drinking it, but not at all enjoying it. If you like extra bold, maybe you'll like this. Not me. Tastes like old coffee grinds to me.

Finally we can feed the cats with vegetarian dry food that cats really like. I hope that soon this company will design CAN food in SMALL cans that will be more tasty to cats that the one they have now. Otherwise the nutritional value of the food is designed to keep your cat in a perfect health.

I used these at a party for a neurosurgeon.  I was pleased with the speed of shipping and the product itself.  The brains were a little smashed together and not as plump and colorful as another brand of gummy brain I'd purchased in the past (but were unavailable at this time).  The flavor was good.
My dog Denali loves the Ziwi Peak food.  It is all meat and we supplement with a little people food and snacks but there is no filler and no byproducts and she eats less volume.

These fries are okay...just not real exciting.
The flavors are a little off and kind of weak.
I don't do spice...but my boyfriend said the jalepeno were pretty good.
These are really light and airy, not super satisfying.
The best part is that you get the whole bag for only 110 calories.
It really feels like you're getting a lot (number wise)--and that's my favorite part of them.
Will eat them all but won't order them again.

BEWARE the changing descriptions here in Amazon folks...when I first viewed this item, admittedly a convenient item to have in the pantry for a snowy day, the descriptions was for THIRTY-TWO (32) 1 quart (32-oz) cartons for around $33...NOT 12 cartons as the description NOW reads. I thought a dollar per carton was a pretty good price, but I NEVER would have ordered it at almost 3 dollars a carton...that's highway robbery.

I am going to complain to Amazon, don't expect to get any satisfaction, but will try anyway.

So be careful: anytime something here in Amazon sounds too good to be true it probably is.
Super delicious! Stores should bring this cereal back all year round not just for halloween.

I make a wonderful hot breakfast cereal with amaranth, a chopped apple, milk, cinnamon and a little stevia. Just remember that if you want salt in your recipe, don't add it until the amaranth is done cooking. Salt inhibits the grains from softening.
My son loves these cookies and they go perfect with applesauce for a snack. I use Amazon's subscribe and save (it's awesome) to get the best price.

We did a lot of research on formula for our son - and switched him from the Similac Advanced that we supplemented with for the first few months, after reading the list of ingredients on the side of the container.

Switching my son to EB was a breeze - we had absolutely no problems with gas or fussiness. It's a great option for those that can't breast-feed.

Regarding the clumping: I typically filter water for my son's bottles in the morning and again in the afternoon, and set the bottles out at room temperature in between. This is how my son prefers his bottles, and I've found that either room-temperature or warmed water helps to break the clumps up and then it's very easy to mix up.
My daughter loves this flavor and the pouch makes it so easy to use on the go.  She doesn't need a spoon, just drinks it from the pouch. Thank you Happybaby!

I order these cracklins and when I got them I was happy until I open a bag and bite into one they were so salty I couldn't even eat them and it wasn't just the one bag every bag was the same I feel as tho I wasted my money and I spent $60.

Summary: Funfresh foods brand pink himalayan salt
Text:
Nice flavored pink salt, love it in curries,spicy nuts,eggs,anything you would use salt on will taste better with this. I haven't seen any remarkable changes in my health for the better, but I am careful,healthy eater anyway.
At this point I would recommend it for nice flavor & neat packaging.

Summary: Weird flavor that I just can't get past
Text: Found this at the grocery store yesterday for $2 a box, so I thought I'd give it a try. I made my first package a few minutes ago. It smelled great while I let it cool, just like a good chai should. But then the aroma changed to something I couldn't quite place, and unfortunately, this oatmeal had a taste to match. I found it very unappetizing, but taste is subjective, so maybe you'll like it.

all of the herbs germinated and grew just fine.I have been cutting and cutting for weeks now and none of them are faltering and I expect to continue having them all summer.It is very convenient to have fresh basil,cilantro,mint,parsely but unfortunately no chives since my cat has taken ownership of them and they are never higher than and inch.but i am sure they would have been good on my baked potato.
bad cat!AeroGarden Gourmet Herb Seed Kit

If you can't have alcohol, this is hands down the best stevia on the market. Very sweet but not at all bitter. A little goes a long way. I use this to sweeten coffee, yogurt, just about anything. I even combine it with the Nunaturals white stevia pure extract powder for baking, and it works great! I won't use any other kind now!

This peanut butter is good--like candy, in fact.  I don't like refined sugar at all in my diet.  And I'm not a health nut.  The diabetes epidemic AND obesity epidemic are leading up to a health care crisis.  Lots of money is spend on these conditions, and lots of doctors get tied up treating them.  What's the cause?  Added sugars in foods.  You can control sugars you can see, but you can't do anything about hidden sugars.  If Jif/Smuckers really wants to do more than marketing, let them cut the sugar.  That could make a real difference.  And I'm not too lazy to stir and I have a refrigerator, so I don't need palm oil either.

Summary: Oh my god - where's the garbage can???
Text: Ordered this with much anticipation, as there are few "ready made" hush puppy mixes on the market.  Made the first batch, took the first taste, and....BLECHHHH! I wonder if I got a bad batch - TERRIBLY over-salted - beyond the point where I could swallow a bite.  It's as if the salt was the primary ingredient in the mix!  Awful, orange coloring also put me off initially.  BAD EXERIENCE; BAD PRODUCT if you're looking for a hush puppy mix.....

We had been buying our sugar-free vanilla syrups at Costco until it was discontinued. Amazon's Torani sugar-free vanilla syrup is an excellent replacement -- and it's delivered to our door at no charge. The price is a little higher but the flavor is far superior -- no unpleasant aftertaste.
We like our morning coffee with flavoring and Torini is about the best we've experienced. We actually find the sugar-free (Splenda) tastes better than the sugar sweetened. No bitterness and very convenient. We'll continue to order our syrups from Amazon...

GREAT SERVICE - GOOD PRICE AND THE COFFEE IS THE VERY BEST - I"M ADDICTED TO IT AND IT IS HARD TO FIND...THANK YOU - THANK YOU.

LEGGENBER

Both my husband and I LOVED the Taco Bell Chipotle sauce, so I was excited to try this one as well.  Boy were we disappointed! It has a creamy base, but tastes awful! It has an oniony, over-seasoned flavor and leaves a fake cheese-like aftertaste (like eating old stadium nachos).  I would HIGHLY recommend the Chipotle sauce (it's more of a spicy ranch flavor) and COMPLETELY PASS on this one!!

I grind and brew my coffee every morning and on the weekend use the French Press and make the occasional espresso.  I am the type that is not into the K-Cup fad or dumping 2creams/sugars into a DunkinDonuts styrofoam coffee cup.  I like my coffee bold with no cream or sugar.  For the price of this coffee, it is above average in quality.  Is it perfect to the coffee aficionado- probably not.  I've been buying Cameron's coffee online for over a year now and am very satisfied.  It is a bargain in my opinion compared to buying a daily cup at the coffee shop or paying for it by the pound at the niche store or in the supermarket.
Delicious strong blue sharp cheese. Hard to imagine anything better. Way better than what you can get in stores outside large cities. 5/5.

I tried giving this to my dog, but the dog wouldn't even try it.
It smelled pretty awful to me too, I don't blame her.
It smelled like a pureed spinach and miscellaneous foods shake.
I'm sure it was healthy, but she has to eat it first.
Other dogs may like it, but mine didn't.
I probably have her spoiled on people scraps!

I love this coffee, it's totally delicious at 6am - first sip of the day, first feeling washing over you that it's time to wake up.  It's smooth, not bitter, and makes me say AHHHH...every single time.  Want to be upfront that I'm more a medium, light, and flavored coffee drinker so I'm not sure the dark roast fans will get that same feeling.  Packaging was fine, none of the cups were damaged in shipping.

My dad has SUFFERED with RLS(Restless Leg Syndrome)his entire life. Five years ago he was given a prescription drug, Requip, which helped some but has side effects of its own. I happened to be speaking to a friend, who recommended this as she had success with her own RLS by using this. I immediately ordered it for dad, and within a few weeks, he could tell a difference. What an answer to prayer!!!!!
Ezekiel 4:9 Original cereal is crunchy, like Grape Nuts, but it has a nicer flavor. Nuttier. Pretty wholesome too. It's my favorite right now.

My wife is the big fan of mulling spice and eggnog spice, I just knew to find it in William Sonoma but it just serve only during chrismas time, and she was so dissapointed when trying to find it now she can't find it in WS, so I find in Amazon to surprise her, out of my expectation she was way too happy and make it very nice drink and food with those spices....she is the best cooks for me.

Discovered this midst the Mayflower Hotel in Seattle. The bartender there is a big fan of the extra horseradish mix and so am I.  As soon as we returned go California we ordered this through Amazon.  Mixed with tomato juice it is far superior to any premixed product.

I am very disappointed about this gift basket. I will probably keep it for myself because it looks so cheap. They packed it FLAT maybe for easier shipping. The basket just looks too far from what I see in the picture.
Ordered these for a quick out the door snack, they are perfect! Delicious and perfectly portioned. They have a great shelf life as well.

Summary: Still my favorite bubble gum - great taste and great for blowing bubbles
Text:
I've tried other bubble gum brands, but I always seem to go back to Bubbilicious for its long lasting flavor and how fun it is to blow bubbles.

The gum material is not a wimp. When I blow bubbles, the bubbles are strong and can get really big (like face big). Results may vary of course :)

This was my go-to bubble gum growing up, and will continue to be as I grow older.

When I went off white sugar and artificial sweeteners several years ago I knew I would miss carbonated beverages. I have tried other brands but Blue Sky Free is by far the best. My favorite flavor is Cherry Vanilla Creme. Refreshing without any unpleasant aftertaste like other brands. My local source stopped carrying this flavor so I was delighted when I found this on Amazon, and the subscription makes it less expensive than what I used to spend.
This is a wonderful product I've been using for years.  I received excellent speedy service - thank you.

Great service, Great product, just awesome. The shipping really is included in the price though that may be confusing, came overnight as said perfect timing and in actuality a little be earlier than said. Great price per berry couldn't find any better price (located in the U.S. too)and with my shipment there was actually few more berries than I ordered. If you want to buy miracle berries than Ethan's Garden is way to go!

I used to use the cheaper grocery store brands. Then two cats got very sick and I had no idea what was causing it. But I changed cat food anyway. They love this! AND they are healthy. It's made from all good food.

I've tried several brands of gluten-free pasta, and Tinkyada is my favorite. Good flavor and texture, keeps well in the refrigerator, and heats up well in the microwave.  Just follow the directions on the package, and get great results every time. They also include "Easy and Energy-Saving Cooking" instructions (boil for 2 minutes, cover and let sit for 20), which I use during hot weather - the pasta still comes out great, and my kitchen stays cooler. Win-win!

Great product. Does not completely get rid of hot flashes and night sweats, but seriously reduces their number and intensity. I tried everything else and this is the only thing that made any difference. I now get reasonable sleep at night.

Summary: COOK WITH THESE AND MAKE A MEAL FROM HEAVEN
Text:
this stuff from which culantro (cilantro) grows is even better than the plant. I use it in all my foods in every way. I will throw it in the pan before oiling to scorch it slightly. I will throw them at the end of cooking, or anytime in between, into soups, saute's, grilled meats, eggs, everything. They truly add a je-ne-se-quoi which you truly miss when it is not there.

My greatest regret is not having a physical address in my rural post area and so I cannot receive them at my Post Office Box. I cannot live without these seeds.

Often what is sold as coriander seed in South Asian and other groceries have been pumped up with additional flowery fragrances - - YUCHK! I prefer the clean, unadulterated seeds and the subtlety they provide and the nuances cooking can introduce.

Throw a handful into any food as it cooks or afterwards, and you will never see salt and pepper again!
Love that I have a healthier option for flavored tortilla chips that actually tastes good!  Can't wait to try them in a taco salad!  Will be buying again!

Summary: My Dog Wouldn't Touch this with a Ten Foot Pole!
Text: My dog seems to be allergic to poultry so we thought we would switch him to this lamb-based formula.  Usually he is a good eater, but my dog had one smell of this stuff and wouldn't come back.  I understand Wellness puts higher-end ingredients in their food but if a dog doesn't like it there goes your money right down the drain.
This cat food is just right for an indoor cat containing tuna,rice and greens.  Healthy,finely chopped and moist enough for my 9-year cat to enjoy.

Had son's fiance and her parents over for breakfast after church and they raved about this cornbread...so I gave her Mom the rest of my 6 pouch box and now I can't find it anywhere.  Found it at Costco once and not there anymore.  I want my cornbread back!!
Our family has tried many pancake mixes and this BY FAR makes the best tasting pancakes.  You hardly need butter and syrup.
it was so yummy that it steered me off my diet for two weeks while i finished off 4 paacks =(
ogs would not touch this dog food.. They will only eat Ceasers.. I guess it was just a cheap food..
Flowers were beautiful and not broken. The only negative would be they did not last very long.

I sure thought having to mix powder with water sounded weird, but I thought it was worth a shot after reading the reviews (and after Walden Farms' peanut spread proved yucky, lol), but it's great! The taste and texture is just like peanut butter--I could kiss whoever came up with this, LOL.

I don't like to waste food, so I have been mixing it with my Walden Farms' spread, which makes it that much less calorie, and it actually tastes good mixed together. Although I like the mixture of the two, PB2 is good enough and low cal enough on its own that I would recommend it to any peanut butter lover that wants to watch their caloric intake (like me!). I will definitely be purchasing it again.

This is the best non caloric sweetener, hands down.  It tastes remarkably similar to sugar.  So far I haven't found anything it doesn't work with, but I will admit I haven't tried making any chocolates or frostings with it, lol.  It's great in drinks and baked goods, though!

Our three cats don't like this variety. Probably because of the herring.
You would figure thyey would love the fish but I guess has too much of a fish odor.

Coming from a popcorn obsessee, this is the BEST STUFF OUT THERE. Actually. I made the mistake of sampling it at the store, bought some, and now I fear I'll never be able to go without it :) It's DELICIOUS. Amazing. You absolutely HAVE to try this. It's the perfect balance of yumminess, with a light, airy texture, and simple ingredients. It's fairly healthy! I could EASILY eat the entire bag in one sitting though, which would kind of cross over the healthy aspect of it ;)

However, this isn't such a great price on it. My Super Target sells each bag for $3.00.... it really should be cheaper to buy it in bulk on Amazon. Unfortunately, this time, it's not :/

Summary: Is Ghee really that Great for you?
Text:
I purchased this having read in the Body Ecology book that it was an excellent alternative to butter, because the milk had been removed and that ghee is does promote phlegm/thick mucus in the way that other dairy products (cream/cheese, etc) does. I didn't think the taste was very strong, and was surprised to see over time, mold in my ghee. I don't know if I contaminated the container with something wet or what? I did just scrap the small spot of mold away and continued to use it.

I haven't bought it again, but thought it was a decent product when I used it. I generally don't buy butter either though.

I don't like the taste of many energy/protein bars because many of them have that dense, vitamin-tasting quality about them.  These bars are different.  Very delicious and taste like an indulgent treat but is low in sugar and high in important protein and has 4 gm fiber to boot.  Glad I found them on here..cheaper than local store.

Summary: Simply put, I loved this coffee
Text: Since I am a fan of flavored coffee, particularly coffee flavored with natural ingredients, I knew I had to try this coffee. As soon as I opened the package to brew a pot, my kitchen smelled of hints of vanilla (my four year old son even asked me if I was baking something).  If anything, the aroma is most satisfying when drinking this coffee, but the taste isn't too strong. In sum, this coffee is good because of its aroma and delicious taste.  I am certainly impressed with Starbucks' new vanilla addition, and I will most definitely continue purchasing this coffee. For a two pack purchase on Amazon, the price is quite reasonable. Bottom line: if you enjoy drinking a nice scented coffee, this one is a must-try!
Price, taste, nutrition, and fiber-benefit flat out beats anything Metamusil could market, and it's organic. You can't be the value of this product. Need I say more?

Summary: The best of what I tried
Text: This is the best coffee that I have tried,and I tried many types of K Cups.Wish it could be packaged in a larger package with more  cups and sold cheaper.

Something about the texture of this cereal... once it's in the milk, it quickly becomes so soggy and mushy that it feels and looks like cat food. it is also very lacking in taste- it's VERY slightly sweetened and lacks the toasted aroma of other "honey toasted' cereal.  Granted, this product is probably a lot healthier.  I wish I liked it since I bought the Costco pack... and I usually LOVE other the other Kashi products (go lean crunch, energy bars), but unfortunately this cereal is not one of their best.
This was just what I was looking for, a good Earl Grey Tea for an affordable price. If you like Earl Grey, you won't be disappointed with this.

Summary: Best protein drink on the market!!
Text: Calnaturale has figured out a way to make a protein drink without that chalky aftertaste.  It tastes like a delicious milk shake yet it's quite healthy with a minimal amount of sugar.  For me, it has become the go to drink after a vigorous workout.
I admit I don't usually drink decaf but this is a favorite in my office and I felt it deserved a good rating.

This was the best $18.00 I ever spent on a box.  I ate that box so fast I was dizzy.  I was skeptical about ordering a box online but there wasn't anything too fishy about this one so I just went to town on it.  I spilled some on the carpet but the dog came over to clean it up.  Whoah, Sparky! That's for me!

Summary: Good quality product, but the flavor is not what I had hoped
Text:
First, this is a good quality product: they use quality ingredients and the crackers have a nice "animal cracker" crunchy texture. Flavor is such a subjective thing that I hate to down-rate a high quality product too much just on that basis. But I won't be ordering any more of these.

My oldest son says they don't have enough cinnamon to achieve a strong cinnamon flavor, but too much to achieve just a hint of cinnamon flavor. I think they actually have the right amount of cinnamon, but aren't quite sweet enough, especially on the exterior. They just come across a little bit bland. I know a lot of people say that is just because people are used to over-sweetened foods, but I think the chocolate chip flavor Snackimals have just the right amount of sweetness. In any case, my kids don't like them - but they do like the chocolate chip flavor.

I used to buy the highly spiced and addictive Wasabi peas from an Asian grocery. They went great with beer. But the crunchiness of the dried peas got to me and my husband after a while, so we stopped getting them. When I run across Blue Diamond Bold Wasabi & Soy Sauce Almonds, I was ecstatic. Now I could once again enjoy the taste of Wasabi as well as enjoy the health benefits of almonds at the same time.

You can tell that these almonds are flavored as they have a powdery coating. I was a little bit worried as I remembered that some of the wasabi peas were very hot. In case you're not familiar with wasabi, it is the green paste that is typically served with sushi and diluted down with soy sauce. It is also known as Japanese horseradish, and is quite hot. Fortunately, Blue Diamond has tempered the wasabi with the savory taste of soy sauce and it's not as hot as it is in Japanese snack food. But make no mistake, it still has a nice kick, but it doesn't have a long lasting effect. The initial punch of heat fades out quickly to make way for the salty, slightly smoky flavor of soy sauce, making it a very enjoyable snack.

5 star snack!

I read some of the other reviews here and decided to try putting a pod in my espresso machine. Worked fine, except the coffee was not very dark. Then I took the pod and dropped it into the coffee to make it darker. Still weak. This is the same problem I have with all the pod/cup/premeasured coffees. While I do know people who drink coffee brewed like this, it's not strong enough for my taste, and I think most people's. The flavor is good, would be delicious if strong, so maybe next time I will use two pods. However, the price is kind of high if you have to use two pods per cup.

UPDATE: Today, I tried using two pods and boiling them in a cup of water, thinking it might work for camping. Still weak. I think you'd need two pods and half a cup, 4oz or so. I noticed that the coffee does not taste full-bodied. It could be dried out from all the processing -- ground coffee should probably be stored in a packed brick, not individual, non-vacuum-packed packets. Oh well.

Actually, I work third shift and its these bad boys that keep me going most of the time. They're pretty addictive though if you like the taste, which is certainly not for everyone. I'd definitely try it out from a local grocery store before shipping yourself a whole 24 pack of them. It also comes in Diet, Guava, and Juiced, of which I personally only like the guava one.

I ordered it because of my boyfriend. He's in the army and when I run with him I need the energy boost to try and keep up but then I realized u can use it for everyday use Like when the kids drive u crazy and ur spent or u don't feel like going to work and u need a kick in the pants!!! Life can be challenging but this drink really is a pick me up!!!! And when u take it I believe it also is a natural laxative because automatically later that day I always have to go, as if it's giving u energy and "cleaning u out"! Definitely try it!!!

Wow does my dog Pie LOVE these treats!! I was so happy to find them on Amazon. I love the fact that these treats are all natural. I'm careful about what I give Pie, especially after the last recall.

And putting artificial food coloring in dog food has to be one of the most idiotic things that a company can do. All natural is the way to go!!

Summary: Great toy but my Rottweiler still destroyed it.
Text: We have a one year old 100 LB Rottie.  He ripped off the legs and i stitched them close.  He still got in there and pulled out the stuffing.  We ended up with a flat gator that lasted a few months.

I BOUGHT THESE FOR MY SMALL DOG WHO WAS HAVEING JOINT PROBLEMS WITHIN A FEW WEEKS SHE IS NOW DOING GREAT NO MORE LIMPING GREAT PRICE AS WELL. IF YOUR LOOKING FOR A JOINT SUPPLIMENT THIS IS A GOOD CHOICE.

I am so delighted to get these Salt and vinegar Almonds. None of the stores near me carry them. They are actually great for my diet. I can eat as many as I like yet the amount has less calories than if I was eating chips. I can only eat so many nuts at a time while I can pig out on chips and waste lots of calories. My friends are always digging in my closet to see if I have any when they visit. Love them.

mls
Great!! Loved the service and the product was delicious, my office family loved them also!!
The order shipped very fast but they were melted when they got to me! 5 pds of melted nothing! Disappointed!

Summary: All I hoped for and more!
Text:
This tea is a marvel.. It smells heavenly, and has the flavor I was hoping for..a value added plus is that I can use the tea leaves twice. Another important point was the prompt shipping and product arrival at my front door. Teavana even sent along a "sample" tea for me to try as well (which I'm planning to serve when my sister comes to visit on the weekend!Look for that post next week!
As always, Amazon is a great place to shop no matter what time of day it is.
Maggie Hickson

I don't actually eat much milk and cereal, but I do snack on frosted mini-wheats throughout the day. I just grab a handful here and there when I'm hungry and looking for a snack.  There IS some sugar added obviously, but there's also a lot of fiber.  When compared to a typical snack, this is the far healthier choice.  Loved them when I was a kid and I love them now.

I picked up this tea with another chai white tea and I mix the too together. The tea is full of flavor. I am not much of a coffee drinker, so I like that this tea has the same caffiene amount, but I do not feel the affects of the caffiene.

I have been using ZICO Bottled Coconut Water(see my reviews there) and have not been very happy with the ADDED FLAVOR in ZICO. I have used different NAKED juice products for sometime and have been happy with their REAL & TRUE 100% juice products. I tried NAKED COCONUT WATER and this is the best you can get closer to real coconut water with NO added flavors. Love the product.

No matter how long I shake the bottle, even after drinking a little for an air pocket, the mix hardly ever fully dissolves. It tastes good, low calorie, easy to carry, good snack.......now just make it dissolve better!

My husband makes the best beef tacos and this is what he uses. Fry the corn tortilla, (bend while frying)...add this meat (heated on the stove) some refried beans, pico de gallo, shredded cheese and pig out!!!! They are amazing!

He has had to buy the Hormel brand before when they were out of Libby, but he says the Hormel brand has too much gravy and less meat.

Also - my daughter (she is 7) loves when we lay out some mini tortilla rounds, add shredded cheese and some of this meat, put in the microwave for 1 minute and Wallah! fast beef nachos.

this was a pleasant surprise to have the awesome texture of licorice with such a strong peach flavor. I was very satisfied with the taste and it surprisingly did not melt during shipment, great product!

If you love a rich butter flavor, this is THE Ghee for you. Made from [...] butter, the best dairy on earth, This concentrates the flavor so a little equals huge butter flavor. No refrigeration needed, perfect for frying, grilling, baking, freezing, any time you would use butter but would love to really enjoy the buttery taste, Please try Ancient Organic Ghee! Eggs, Popcorn, Shortbread, Lobster, Tortillas, Baked Potato, Veggies.....What do you like with butter?
My grandson loves these brownie bites and I can no longer find them in the store. Thanks for offering them online. You are a lifesaver.

Summary: Good but liked Green mountain better
Text: Ordered these for my husband and he said they are okay but he likes the Green Mountain brand better.  Next time will order the Green Mountain brand.

Very nice stuff. Not too sweet (not sweet at all). Tastes like what Monteczuma might have drank. A little bitter but VERY refreshing. Might be the Belgian Chocolate.
I would recommend this to any serious chocoholic.
I have used this flavor - pea and duck for quite some time but the last 5 bags I have purchased smells HORRIBLE. I'm very disappointed and hope the manufacturer fixes the problem.

Summary: Wonderful in Coffee or Hot Chocolate
Text:
I've tried other Maxwell House International Coffee flavors before so I had a pretty good idea that this would be good. When you open it up the powder looks pretty much just like hot chocolate and I couldn't even smell the peppermint. So the first thing I tried it in was coffee. I added two teaspoons to my regular cup of coffee and it was delicious. The peppermint flavor came through well and the latte part was maybe too much but I'd already added creamer to my coffee so it's probably a suit to taste issue. I also tried adding it to my regular hot chocolate and that was really good too. Drinking it with hot chocolate allowed me to taste the mocha flavor along with the peppermint. I have not tried it as a standalone product.

I'd recommend this to anyone that likes peppermint.

Good product! If you are set on chewing gum this is the stuff. You can feel the difference, teeth stay cleaner between brushings. Sugar sweetened gum will degrade your dental health if you are a constant gum chewer like me. I just hope they don't find out something seriously wrong with xylitol down the road. ;)

I was attracted to the new flavors, non-GMO corn, all-natural flavorings and bag, and the clean packaging.
And I was wowwed. Loved the lemon and seasalt and the rosemary too. Yes so it's a bit more than typical popcorn, but it's still inexpensive and you know that EVERYTHING is clean, green and tasty. Good for a tasty snack, kids, and families. Brought it to a little gathering and everyone loved it.

After trying the Marley Coffee, I was pleased with its rich flavors of floral and berry.  This coffee does tend to have a slight  bitter aftertaste, so might be better for individuals who prefer "stronger blends".  Another plus is that the coffee comes from all organic sources, and is made of 100% Arabica beans (common among finer coffees).  So for all you coffee lovers out there, this one I definitely recommend.

Summary: For lovers of strong dark roasts only
Text: I'm a dark roast lover, but this was too strong for me - regardless of how I made it.  I gave it to a friend who thought it was fabulous.  So here's my advice: don't make it too strong - it becomes bitter, and if you're not sure you like dark roasts....go with the light roast here.  Kona is traditionally very smooth coffee, and this is, but it's truly for strong dark coffee lovers.
Love this stuff and the convenience of the smaller bags. Packs great in lunch boxes and bags.

Had this sent to my best friend's house for making lavender foods and she received it WAY ahead of schedule. It smells amazing and has flavored everything from homemade soups to cookies, even bread. And we still have a TON left!!! A little goes a LONG way, and I love lavender!!!! Will definitely order again in the future!

I felt it was Christmas morning while we opened up the box and looked at each cup.  We received 50 cups with the earlest expiration date wasn't for another 3 months.  Even with that it was only for a 5-9 cups (seasonal flavors).  Most of the expiration dates were at least 6 months beyond.
I absolutely love this stuff,i use it for my hair and i no longer have any frizz and i am totally in love with this product.
I use Almond extract alot aroung the holidays...tired of buying those little bottles for almost $3 each....very happy with purchase.  Great price

Summary: Both my cats threw up after eating this!
Text: My cats are not picky eaters, and lick their bowls clean of virtually anything i feed them (wellness, fussie cat, fancy feast, bff). I tried feeding them Tiki Cat on 2 separate occasions, and my cats threw up both times. I thought they may have gotten sick the first time from eating something off the floor, but when it happened a second time I was certain it was the Tiki Cat. I'm not sure if I received a bad batch, but I will certainly never be purchasing a Tiki Cat product again.

My all time favorite!  Very difficult to find in stores.  Great that Amazon has it available.  Outside is chocolate with nut chunks, inside is a creamy cherry filling with a whole cherry in the middle. You have to try this.

I'm using Nutiva coconutoil since 2008, and I always bought 54oz pacakge. This time I bought 15oz and it's nothing compared to the 54 oz. This is not cocnut oil at all. It is more like dalda(vanaspati)in cosistency and has no coconut flavor/smell at all. I'm disappointed in this product!

Summary: A no-risk bet for vinegar connoisseurs
Text:
Note the carefully-worded item description: "over" 75 years old. That leaves the door open for some really old bottles...and the older the vinegar the better, right? I have it on good authority that some of these bottles are at least 150 years old, meaning that some bottles may contain the very vinegar used to kill President Lincoln! For true vinegar aficionados, such an opportunity should be impossible to pass up. Get a case to save on shipping and increase the odds of owning a piece of history.

Goes well with The Prestige on DVD, too!

What a bargain! We got these for less than half of the price we would have paid for them on sale with a coupon. They arrived in good shape with an expiration date about a year from now. The grandchildren are enjoying them.

OK - so to start with, I LOVED my Senseo coffee system. Have gone through 5 machines in 10 years - they eventually leak and cause problems so it's easier to buy another. That being said the last couple of years it's been harder to find another machine (Ebay mostly) but I NEEDED my Senseo. Then this past spring (May, June) I stopped receiving my Amazon shipment of PODS and found out that they were becoming obsolete everywhere. Couldn't get them. Period.

I had to break down and purchase a Tasimo machine and the coffee to go with it (lots of plastic waste in the little cups) but I digress . . . so I've been 2 months with this new machine, and what arrives at my door last week ???? A CRAPlOAD of Senseo coffee pods!!!!! Not one month's supply but THREE.

Now I ask you if I drink coffee everyday, and you stop delivering my coffee for 3 months . . . . how (or why) do you think that when you do come into some inventory that I'd want (or need) to have the three months worth of coffee . . NOW??? Those days are gone and I invested in a new machine.

I'm sending them back, if anyone else needs them ;)

Summary: Taste 3 stars, Price 5 stars, So 4 stars......
Text:
So far have tried two flavors, this and oat & raisins and prefer the other better. This flavor tastes a little bland compared to the other for some reason even though it has more ingredients. But it's not inedible or anything, just a little bland.

As for whether it helps you feel full.... I'd say it doesn't for me cause it's just a 3oz size afterall and I'm used to eating a lot more. But I always skip breakfast so eating this is better than nothing considering studies show breakfast is the most important meal of the day. Eating breakfast also helps you lose weight and raise metabolism.

I'd give the taste 3 stars but bought it for amazing $2 (17 cents each cookie) so price gets 5 stars which avg out to 4 stars.

If you subscribe, you save and you don't have to trek to the store to buy these bulky boxes. I thought purchased enough for a 2 months supply but no, my cats must not be felines because they have appetites like pigs. ;) I have to change my subscription so that they deliver more frequently.

Discovered this at a hotel breakfast buffet, and was happy to find it on Amazon.  Just the right amount of sweetness.  I've always used the refrigerated versions of Coffeemate creams, but for some reason sweetened original is not an option.  The nice part about this cream is that you can taste the coffee rather than the flavoring of the cream.  I can't drink coffee "black", so this is the closest I can get to enjoying the coffee itself.  It's A LOT of cream to have on-hand, but it keeps well, especially since it does not require refrigeration.

I don't really know how to review cat food, but my two Bengals seem to love this stuff. One of them eats every flavor Weruva, but the other will only eat the Mack and Jack. I like that I can see the pieces of fish in the food, it's not some mystery ground product like some brands I've seen.
Shipping is always super-fast.

If you are a licorice lover this tea will be a special

treat without all the calories.

This water is the first thing I have found that gives me energy on tired days.  Better than coffee which actually makes me tired.  Get it!  You won't regret.  It tastes great and is refreshing and energizing for your BLAH tired days- or for everyday! I usually don't write reviews but I love this stuff.

I tried steel-cut oatmeal for the first time this week and I am hooked! I'll never go back to regular oatmeal again! I cook mine overnight in the slow cooker using a variation of Alton Brown's Overnight Oatmeal recipe, substituting raisins for the figs just because I like them better. My slow cooker tends to run hot so I put the temperature to "warm" overnight and then crank it up to "low" about an hour before serving (just enough time to have coffee and read the morning paper!). My family devoured it and asked for more! Pretty good for folks who don't normally even eat breakfast!

[...].

When the kids saw Orzo, they were disappointed, because they are not big fans of rice. But the taste sold them.
Not giving it 5 stars due to "Broccoli dust" every body complained about. I added real broccoli though.
Will buy more.

Summary: Metallic Taste is the Deal Breaker
Text: Purchased this to use for travel as it's difficult to find iced coffee in most hotels & using water to mix makes it the perfect travel drink. I so wanted to love this. You have to shake vigorously - preferably using a shaker with a stirring ball or filter - as it's VERY grainy & takes about 2 minutes of solid shaking. Grainy I can live with, but the taste is the deal breaker. It has an incredibly strong metallic taste. The only way to soften the taste is to add lots of milk, which defeats my purpose of bringing a water mixing drink to travel. It's expensive for the convenience and would have been worth it - if only I could drink it. Oh well, the search for a traveling, water mixing iced coffee continues.
Some of the BEST COFFEE I've ever tasted. If this coffee doesn't go much higher in price I will still be buying it. Much better than the Senseo Coffee I can no longer get at a good price.

This might be an excellent cereal, but the boxes that I bought had large pieces stuck together that were hard as a rock and dangerous to the fillings in your teeth.  They can be manually broken apart, but that is a lot of extra trouble.  Other than that, the flavor is good.  It does have a significant amount of fiber, and a reasonable amount of protein.  There is a potential problem with sodium deficiency if you eat too many foods low in sodium (that can cause muscle cramps, especially in your legs).

Summary: The only Crystal Light Flavor I drink!!
Text: I have tried a few of the Crystal Lights and the Raspberry Ice Tea is the only one that I LOVE.  I hope they do not stop producing it, I will be lost without it.
This is an excellent treat for dogs.  Our dog loves them and it is a healthy alternative to some other chewies.

This is a really good tasting tea and I should know! Having lived all over the world I love many English teas and this definitely great. I brew each k-cup twice into a big mug and it works well.

You can also brew these twice (medium) cup so the price works well.

Tastes really bad. A strong Chemical after taste.
zero grams sugar, but still products tastes sweet -- loaded with chemicals and artifical sweetners
one bite and it fills your stomach. A bloaty feeling just after a couple of bites.
a definete NO-NO for any one 12 and younger. But also not recommended averse to eating food with unnaturnal ingrediants.

Since Amazon does not accept return of grocery items - I had to trash the product.

This has been such a joy in my life.  I am a diabetic and it is so nice to have some decaf, sugar free coffee when I want it.  This makes it easy for all my guests to have a choice of their regular coffee or General Food International Coffee.  Love it

Summary: Can't believe I haven't tried it sooner...
Text: I'm angry that I didn't try this sooner.  It beats the pants off of the powdered stuff in pre-measured packets, that's for sure!  I love the hint of cinnamon.  When I made the first batch, I thought that it may have a grainy feel, because it looks a little grainy, but it does not have a grainy mouthfeel at all.  My husband was hesistant (he thinks cinnamon smells like armpits (???)), but anyway, he was in love with it, too.  Wish I would have tried this many years ago!

I LOVE this product! It is a strong, dark roast, full of flavor, with a wonderful aroma. Not for the feint of heart! My only 2 problems with this coffee are, 1: No one carries it locally, so I can only get it through Amazon (Not really a problem), and, 2: I zoom through a box of it way too fast, because it's soooooo good!

Requires 2 capsules to make a good cup of coffee over, 8 oz or more. If you follow the directions on your CBTL machine and use just 1 you will end up with watered down and weak coffee. Using 2 caps is just not economical and defeats the whole purpose of the design. K-Cups are better for coffee then these little cups that only hold 1/2 the coffee needed for the job. Making 10 or 12 oz coffee with this is really just hot water.

I think the design is great for this treat delivery toy.  The large puck shaped things are too easy for my dog to remove so I load one of those and some dog biscuits into the ball once he gets the puck out I take that away.  Too much treat at one time for him.  He doesn't mind cause I think he likes his biscuits better anyway.  After tonight's 4 mile hike he is still into his everlasting... stuffing it with his normal biscuits keeps him entertained and preoccupied. He has brought it to me tonight about three times.  Each time I say Yep there is more... and toss it back to him...

I read through all the reviews before buying this product hoping that I wouldn't be one of the people who noticed the odor and weird aftertaste. Unfortunately it was just too pronounced.  I made a couple things with the mix and my family and I all found it awful.

Summary: My Favorite Brand of Rye Crackers!
Text: The Ryvita Dark Rye is my favorite brand of Rye Crackers.  I've tried Wasa and Kavli brands and enjoy the Ryvita best of all.  It has a better taste and a nice crisp texture.  Great with goat cheese, smoked salmon or nut butter for a healthy snack!  Rye is one of the least glutenous grains. Ingredients of this product are simple - just whole grain rye flour and salt.

Summary: cat hates it and it made her sick
Text: Very disappointed.  Made my cat sick.  Total waste of money.  Back to just eating tuna for our girl.  Can't afford to waste money.

I initially got this for my lemon cleanse. Since you can eat up alot of money for a 10 day cycle, this is a good bang-for-the-buck option. I had some left over and started to use it with my oatmeal. It was so good with it, my wife started eating it as well! (and she hates oatmeal).

Compared to other options at the stores, you really cannot beat the price for this organic option. I will be buying more soon!

I bought the top sirloin hoping to finally get a "good" steak at home.
The first ones we cooked....could hardly cut with a steak knife.
The second time we tried them, I tenderized for quite some time.
They were more edible that way, but still nothing better than I could have bought at the local grocery store.

Except for the packaging, there is nothing good I can say about these steaks.
If you figure the price per pound, these steaks should cut with a butter knife.

Will never buy again.
And I mean that in the best way... these are tasty and everything I would expect if bought at the local store!

I bought this product in the plastic tray format, and when I got home and opened the package I was in for a suprise.  Not only was the product no where near as good as I remembered it to be, but it had a 3" by 4" label smack dab in the middle of the front.  When I opened it, yup, no candy underneath the label.  Talk about 'false advertising'.  Will never buy these again just on principle.  This company evidently doesn't care about a loyal following.  Fool me once...

My mothers cat got very sick from stress & a poor diet of fancy feast for 18 years! Mocha, is a very picky old cat and was vomiting & urinating all over the house. After multiple visits to the vet we tried over 15 different kinds of cat foods to no avail! She was not eating AT ALL! In a last attempt I took a friends recommendation and tried the canned wild salmon food........ & oh my! I was scared Mocha was going to choke, she was eating so fast! It has been about 2 months now & she is a whole different kitty! Healthier & happier than ever! Thank you so much! This food literally saved her life!

I don't have much problems with dandruff so much as sometimes just having an itchy scalp. I've always tried to use some dandruff shampoo at least a couple times per week because it seems to help. This shampoo is well geared toward men - not much scent, lathers well, and works. The lather is very dense, and the shampoo cleans well.

This particular variety is supposed to "Refres", which I'm guessing is why the ingredients include menthol and one other incredient not found in some of the other variations. Some shampoos with menthol have set my head tingling immediately - I don't notice that with the Clear brand. If it does anything, it's barely perceptible to me. Scent is the same as the other variety I tried - basically, a fresh apple sort of smell.

My only complaint is the bottle - it's top heavy and one of the two bottles I received had leaked even though the lid was taped shut. Therefore, I wouldn't throw this in a suitcase or gym bag.

Summary: Slightly pink in color, but salt non-the-less.
Text: Can't tell it is any different than normal salt, except for a slight pink tinge. But if it has all the great minerals and stuff... all the better!
OMG this bone was gone in 5 minutes! My lab ate the entire thing. I gave it to him, turned my back....and POOF! It was gone.

Summary: Absolutely awesome that Amazon carries this item now!
Text:
So, I absolutely love Honey Nut Clusters. I think it's something bordering on criminal that I can't find this cereal anywhere in my local market (Spokane, WA). It's been several years since I've been able to enjoy a bowl.. and now I'm quite excited that I have 3 boxes on the way! Thank you Amazon.

As for the review.. I think Clusters cereal is about the best that I've ever had. Yum.

- Matthew

Summary: Badly designed bottle, OK shampoo for UNcolored hair
Text:
The bottle for this shampoo has an opening that you lever up when you want to put shampoo on your hair. The problem is that it also levers up easily during shipping, meaning the bottle is covered with shampoo when it arrives. Amazon did wrap the bottle in a plastic bag to limit the damage, but the manufacturer should really design a bottle that doesn't leak, or at least seal the top with plastic tape.

Clear Scalp & Hair Therapy has a strong, lingering fruity scent. Whether you like it will be a matter of taste. I color my hair, and I was hoping that a "damage and color repair" shampoo would do a good job of preserving color. I can't speak to the damage repair part, but it's not a very good color preserving shampoo. I would recommend it for someone with average, uncolored hair.

These bars do not qualify as high protein or health bars, but exceed in the taste department. Contain all natural ingredients, which will give you instant energy for that tennis game or other favorite sport. Not recommended as trail bars, because heat will melt the dark chocolate in the bar. Can be refrigerated. The three main ingredients are almonds, dark chocolate and cherries, in that order. They do contain some added vitamins. Recommended.

Let me start off by saying that I am not a tea drinker at all! I am more of a coffee person. Anyway, I decided that I was gonna dry up my milk supply and read somewhere that sage tea decreases milk supply. I went ahead and ordered this tea for that purpose. It says on the box that the tea is very bitter so I went ahead and added 1 teaspoon of honey. It worked perfectly. I do see that it has diminish my need to pump dramatically. I went from pumping 4-5 times a day to twice a day the 1st two days since I started drinking the tea. Yesterday I only did it once and today none so far. I am not in pain, though my breasts are still tender to the touch. I would 100% recommend this to any mother trying to stop her milk supply.

Summary: My dog wont touch anything else!
Text: My dog will only eat Stella and Chewy's carnivore kisses and Carnivore Crunch. Seriously she sticks her nose up at any other treats I've tried to give her. I've trained her to do all sorts of things for these treats. She goes insane for them. We went to the pet store a few days ago and she managed to find stella and chewy treats out of everything in the whole store. There the best!!!
This product is a good take on whole corn pepper spice. It is a bit heavy on the black pepper (India), but can keep your potency and flavor for your fine taste needs at a applicable pricing scale.

The Julian's Bakery 2 carbs bread and the raisin cinnamon bread used to be great.  I tried the new Paleo breads and they were so awful that I had to spit them out.  Then I re-ordered the 2 carbs and the cinnamon raisin, but they have a new recipe.  Now they are terrible, but not quite as bad as the Paleo.  I was able to eat one slice of each, but then threw out both loaves.  I hope they go back to the old recipe.  I'm so disappopinted with the new recipes, because they used to be very good.  I remember that Carb Krunchers used to have good bread, so I'll go back and try them again.

We ordered these coffee packets to use during travel over the holidays. They are easy to carry and taste much better than any instant coffee I've ever tried. They come in very handy when you need a mid afternoon coffee break while visiting relatives. My coffee arrived directly from Starbucks with an April 2012 expiration date-about 5 months away. The only improvement they could make on this product is to design a package that is easier to open. While the packs are small and easy to carry, I haven't been able to open one without scissors.
Great product-highly recommended. I think I'll try to add one to some hot chocolate next.
We tried several K cups and settled on Emeril bold as our favorite . We have a regular monthly order and get a great price in return . Very pleased !

We discovered the difference in the quality dog foods when I started searching for a new food because of repeated ear infections.  We recently switched to Organix after the Innova plant was bought out.  I tried several other foods but this is the best.  My dog loves it, her coat is shiny and thick.  She has had no problems switching to it.  She is spoiled, and has to have a small amount of human food mixed in her dry.  I can take a tablespoon of Organix canned and mix it with this and she eats the whole bowl.  In the past she would turn her nose up at any canned mix-in.  I highly recommend this food and I highly recommend Amazon for the best price.

I have purchased this product 3 times using the monthly subscription process.
The first case had multiple tainted bags. By tainted I mean that some portion of the product in the bag had turned to a powder consistency and smelled foul. I didn't realize it the first time, and after feeding it to my dog, it made him sick for a few days. I assumed that this was an anomaly, so I removed the bad bags, and let the subscription continue. The second and third cases also had a couple of tainted bags.
As I see it, since I'm having to throw away multiple bags per case, purchasing this way is not a good deal. Instead, I'm going back to purchasing cases of this product from Sam's Club. Those cases never had bad bags.

Great taste and excellent nutritional value. Would definitely recommend to someone looking for a high protein shake or meal replacement. This fills me up a lot more than a standard protein shake. Will buy again...

There are just some foods that bring the kind of nostalgia that washes over you like warm tropical water lapping at your feet... this syrup certainly jolted me back to my childhood... that is, being sick and being force-fed Robitussin.

Maltitol must surely be what sweetens Robitussin. Seriously, it's quite distinctive.

These toaster pastries taste, especially when toasted.  I avoid anything with partially hydrogenated vegetable oil, and these fit the bill.  I include them in my daughter's lunch and also have them for snacks.  They are 210 calories apiece, which is a bit much for a snack, but you can always cut them in half.  A case is a lot of toaster pastries, but we are not getting sick of them, and you can also use these for groups of kids, like after soccer games, etc.  The price is less than the local health food store, and now I don't have to make a special stop to pick them up.

Let's be honest, a brewed cup might be a little bit better, but I really like this instant and it just makes it easier at the office where we have hot water, but no coffee maker. It is really inexpensive as the coffee is in really small granules and the jar is really big and so it makes tons of cups of coffee.  I like to be highly caffeinated and this works for me.  I also get the Vanilla flavor sometimes.  It's quite good also.  Thanks Ben for turning me onto this great coffee!

I like a nice strong mocha each day and use this mix to make a dark, rich hot chocolate which I then blend w my coffee. I have tried many mixes and this one suits my tastes b/c it's darker and richer than other hot chocolate mixes I have tried.

Summary: I saw a difference in my dog
Text: I gave my  14 year old terrier these treats and really believe that these have helped him to feel better. He has lately been playing with his ball, (he self plays and had not been doing this for years) happy to watch him on long walks. He is very happy to keep walking. He is doing very well
These soy nuts are the perfect snack.  Just the right amount of sea salt and satisfying.  I also love that they are organic and not made from GMO soybeans.

Summary: Mealy texture for an oatmeal cookie
Text: These cookies would be better if they were made with rolled oats instead of oat flour. The crumbly and mealy texture does not provide an enjoyable experience.

The nuts are too hard for my teeth.  Also, delivery was made by UPS, which must have put the items on their truck in the morning but didn't deliver until 7 o'clock that evening.  By then, in the Florida heat, the chocolate coating had melted and stuck to the wrappers.  Would not order by mail again.

I have been trying to find a good brand of jerky that I don't have to order online.  I finally tried Jack Link's original.  Way too sweet, doesn't taste like meat, and most of the pieces don't have the texture of meat.  At times, I thought I was eating plastic.  Or some soy meat-substitute.  I couldn't even make it through the whole bag.  I miss the original Pemmican..., before ConAgra sold the brand and it got ruined...

I've tried several different brands of low-carb pasta including Dreamfields and Al Dente is the best. You can't tell that it's low carb. In fact, I used it in a soup that I made for a group and everyone went for seconds. I paid less getting it at Amazon than I would have at the Al Dente site. Got free shipping too so it only cost me $2.50 a bag.

I like this cookies.
Raspberry jam filling in the cookies tastes very good.
But.. It's too sweet for me.

Summary: Great concept, not so great in execution
Text:
When I saw this product I thought it was absolutely the best thing out there that was going to make my life so much easier. So I ordered them and they come in the 4 pack here so you'll have 8 spoons. It was slightly less than the price I see today for 8 of these. Other sites are cheaper but you only get 2 and you end up paying around $7-8 for just the 1 pack (2 spoons) so I figured why not get more. I now regret it ...

The spoon is a bit too deep and big for my 9 month old. She uses the "NUK Gerber BPA Free Soft Bite Infant Spoon" and those are very soft, not as deep, and just the right size. These spoons are plastic and too big for her mouth. I would say it's okay and that she'll grow "into" it but the foods they fit on are for 6 month old babies so it doesn't make sense to have a spoon this big.

Well, I still love the idea so I'll keep trying but up until now I've had no luck with her eating out of these.

Have ordered these on multiple occasions. Have a significant other that digs these, and massive amounts of someone's favorite candy is a great gift when you need one. They always arrive quickly, in great condition, fresh and everything.
Sour Skittles are tasty.
Oh, plus these are the bigger packages of them, which is neat.

Fabulous on salads, Fabulous on humus, Fabulous on lots of things I eat on a regular basis.
It's amazing how these plain, simple pine nuts make a bland salad turn into a standout salad.
I wouldn't consider being without this product in my kitchen.
I usually like instant coffee, but this doesn't do it for me.  Maybe with sugar it's potable, but I drink my coffee black, and I can barely get this down.  Back to the drawing board.

ProfileName: Tommie "An expert is a former drip under pres...
Text: I have to ignore my coconut nectar in the cabinet. It is wonderful! I have been known to eat it by the spoonful all by itself. I'm still on the first bottle (I have more), so my ignorance is proven to be valuable. The next batch of fudge I make will be sweetened with this. YUM-ALICIOUS!!

Summary: This is a delicious decaff coffee!!!
Text: I buy this on the subscribe & save program, which seems to be discontinued at this time. I have had about 4 shipments of 6 bags each. My sister and I enjoy this coffee everyday! I alternate a shipment to her and then to me. Perfect for moments when you are the only one drinking it, and don't want to waste coffee or time to fill up a regular coffeemaker. I use it at work, because I'm the only one who drinks decaff.

With Amazon's Subscribe & Save option these are well below $1 per package! I am able to make 1/2 of the packet if I don't need the whole thing. Just mix it with water in the pan and whisk while it comes to the boil and simmer for only one minute and I had tasty vegan gravy! It was perfect on my Edward & Sons organic, vegan, gluten free Instant mashed potatoes! What could be easier or better?

They also have a good looking recipe on the back of the packet for a lentil loaf that I plan on trying.

Now I can't wait to try Roads End Organic's Savory Herb and Shiitake Mushroom varieties!
I was disappointed in this trail mix. The peanuts are soft, and there are ALOT of seeds in the bag as well. Not bad enough to throw away, but I will try another brand next time.
The contents settle to the bottom of the pack and you really can't get it out,it's not conveient.I am not going to order it again.Jason's almond butter packets are much better.

My dog has to take seizure pills and after 2 months of shoving them down her throat and finding the pills around the house, I saw Pill Pockets at the vet. She likes them, the pills don't get spit out, and I don't get growled at, it's great! The pills are tiny, so I split one pill pocket up and can wrap four pills up. I put the extras in an empty pill bottle to keep them fresh. She doesn't mind the smaller size. They do leave your hands kind of greasy though.
Very delicious coffee, just when you need a good cup of coffee in a rush, there you have this little packs full of flavor and aroma. Loved it!

Confronted with a cloudy, rainy, dreary autumn day? The cure is simple: A perfect snack. The necessary ingredients remind me of some of my earliest memories. Born in Scotland, my mother enjoyed the staples of the old country.  What could satisfy more than a cup of tea and a piece of wheat bread toast? Prepared authentically, each piece of toast should be slightly burnt. A couple of scrapes with a knife will cure that! When I smell bread burning in a toaster, I always think of my Mom in our kitchen making an afternoon snack. No toast is complete without orange marmalade. Ordinary jelly will not do! The only brand acceptable is Keiller's Dundee orange marmalade made with an authentic recipe dating back to 1797. Imposters, like the watery Bonne Maman of France and the Swiss Hero varieties, can't compete with the real thing. Since 1988, Keiller's has been manufactured in the Robertson's plant in Manchester, England (horrors!) The taste is still intact. It is a thick, tangy delight packed with sweet, thinly-cut orange rind congealed in a perfect jelly. Look for Keiller's distinctive white glass jar. Yum.
this was delicious coffee for a great price which i could not find at any store in my area or areas nearby

I expected Italian coffee to be very bold, so I was incredibly disappointed that this seems so bland. Maybe I need to use more, perhaps double the usual amount per cup. I am following my coffee makers instructions and the coffee turns out very weak.

This product ended up being a $15 camera case.  The seller, BestPriceCenter does not sell food.  Make sure you order from a correct listing.  The seller did agree to refund after I ship the product back.

A bunch of flax seed in a sealed plastic bag.  I grind these up and put them in my morning oatmeal.  Nice source of fiber and good fats.  Barry Farms was great as always (3 orders with them so far), and I'm really liking the idea of flax seed in my diet.

Overall good It has a creamy green tint to it, The first bit i was thinking "i need salt" but i ate it all and NOW feeling satisified! For it being organic & salt free i am suprised how yummy it really was. I would suggest this soup to anyone. And will eat it over & over again! True it MIGHT not have a lot of chicken, but the tiny 5 pieces it did have were good. I liked it like that.
My puppy had a severe diarrhea for weeks until we put her on Wellness Lamb and Sweet Potato.  Just like a miracle, she is healthy and energetic.
hit and miss on the flavors here.  but nice to try a sample pack and see what the family likes. maybe try in store first to see which flavors you might like.  very strongly flavored which is a plus.

We were the grind your own beans, french press coffee people.  Till I decided to try this from a local Co-op.  I'm not sure why since I wouldn't even think about buy pre-ground coffee such as Folgers, let alone drink instant coffee.  But boy am I ever glad I tried this product.  It's super easy, quick, tastes amazing, rich and bold without the acidic after taste.  Okay it's instant coffee, so keep that in mind but if you looking for a quick coffee fix, you won't be disappointed.

I grill and barbeque a lot and use "rubs" that I make and a very few commercial products, mainly because most commercial rubs aren't all that good. Byron's, however is the real deal: since buying this stuff, I have used it on ribs, pork butt roast, steaks and turkey. It produces consistantly great results on grilled food, low & slow barbeque and even on oven roasted meats. It adds a nice zip to soups, salads and veggies too. I will be seasoning the Thanksgiving turkey with it at the request of my SO.

I concur with the reviewer who urged potential customers to get the big size: it gets used up real fast!!

Summary: Organic, so of course you sacrifice taste
Text: They won't taste the same as other gummies.  And they were less chewy than other gummies like Albanese (best tasting ones I've found) or Haribo.  Chewiness is one of elements I love about gummies, so I will not purchase Yummy Earth again.  But if you are really looking for a  healthier substitute, judge for yourself.

I really liked these graham crackers. There isn't anything different about the taste of coarse but the way they are packaged is ideal for man things.

Instead of being big rectangular pieces these are halved. This makes them ideal for parents with smaller kids who just want to give their kid a quick snack.

Another great use for these is definitely smores! Thanks to these already being broken down into squares you don't have to worry about accidentally breaking them when juggling your chocolate and a flaming marsh mellow.

The only thing I could offer in the way of advise to Honey Maid would be to package them in stacks of 3 instead of 6 as the serving size is 3, but that isn't anything to keep me from purchasing these.

I'll be keeping an eye out for these at my local grocer!

I've been eating these NV Granola Bars since I was but a lad, munching away on them with orange slices at soccer games. They're timeless, and a sweet treat. Yes, they're probably not too healthy considering they have a fair bit of sugar. But in this economic climate, they're cheaper than say a Clif bar, and no less tasty.

I rarely eat these bars plain- usually I break it up into my plain yogurt with fresh fruits, or into my cereal. 5 thumbs up for a nice snack.

First line of "product features" states:

"contains one can each of Bird in Hand, Cookie Jar, Game Day Chili, Mull Over This, Peace of Pie and Roast to Toast tins"

This line is INCORRECT.

The 4th line is correct:

"Six tins (1 tin each of chile pepper (mild), coriander, cumin, fennel seed, ginger & turmeric) come in a handsome box and stylish belly band."

Since the product is not returnable, don't make the same error I did!

Note to AMAZON: I love your service and order from you often, but I was very disappointed with the misleading product features. PLEASE CORRECT THIS. I am out $32+ dollars.

Summary: Extra nutrition for a vegan diet (or any diet!)
Text:
Being vegan, I look for quality nutrition from pretty interesting sources. I blend smoothies very often (thanks to the book Green for Life for giving me many recipes to play with). Usually I blend up greens, bananas, strawberries, and add flax oil, hemp protein, and nutritional yeast. Adding a tablespoon of these seeds adds quite a nice dose of nutrition.

Most seeds and nuts are high on fat, and these are no exception (50% fat by volume). But for most diets the pros outweigh the amount of fat. Plus, a little healthy fat is necessary in a balanced diet.

They taste great. Very mild. They are great for baking, topping oatmeal or cereal, putting in a cup of almond milk, adding to smoothies (of course), or just eating raw. You can also soak them in water for a bit to make a nice paste (which is a good way to use it in baking recipes also).

The packaging is nice. There is not a ton of wasted space, the seeds fill the entire bag. They are USDA organic.

I highly recommend them as a source of alternative nutrition, especially for vegetarians and vegans, but for anyone really.
This turkey jerky is really good.  Just the right amount of flavor and chewiness.  I only wish it wasn't so expensive.  Love that it's gluten free and all natural, so we'll keep ordering!

New Update, Well as it turns out the Ethical Coffee Company has came through. They contacted me about the problem I had and have replaced my machine, so they do stand behind their word and will honor their guarantee. It took a few weeks but they did what they said they would. Therefore I will continue to use their products.

ProfileName: G. Grote "If you're not having fun, lower you...
Summary: Same tea ... less money ... what's not to love?
Text:
I've been buying the 20-bag boxes of this tea from the grocery store for several months, long enough to know that I like it, and to make it worth my while buying it in bulk. Every night I make enough to fill my thermos bottle (a bit more than 4 cups, I believe) in a tea pot using 3 bags. These bags are a different style than the individually packaged bags, and they come packaged 4 in each envelope, but I can notice no difference in taste or quality from the individually packaged bags that I was buying before, so why not save money while I'm at it?

Others have complained about the multi-bag packaging, but since I use 3 bags a day it doesn't bother me at all ... the envelopes are easy to fold over to keep the extra(s) fresh until tomorrow.

If I have to complain about something, it would be how the strings are attached to the bags ... I use a pot that has a screen basket in the middle to hold the bags, so I don't want the strings in there as well ... I became accustomed to being able to yank the strings off the bags of the individually packaged bags, but doing the same thing with these bags tears the top of the bag (which isn't an issue for making the tea, just for cleaning the basket afterwards) ... so now I cut the strings off with a scissors ... a trivial thing, but I thought I would pass it along in case anyone cares.

So ... if you like Bigelow Earl Grey ... and if you make your tea by the pot, or if you use more than 1 tea bag per day, then this is the way to go!
The product is good but Amazon can't pack it.  Most likely you will get a broken crate that can't be fixed and some of the chocolates will have leaked.

Tried it this am for 1st time, its very good, a dark strong taste, which I love but Im sure you can adjust to your liking, I did 4 scoops for 8 cups and perfect for me, if you like strong. It smelled like a coffee house here this am, even hubby got up to smell early. He also liked it.

Summary: My dogs go crazy for these.
Text: We have a lot of foster dogs that come in and out of our house, and I've yet to meet a dog that doesn't love Dingos. I don't know what it is about these things, but they bring out the crazy in my dogs. We have to give them to the dogs while crated or they will fight over them, even dogs that don't have resource guarding issues. They must be delicious?

When I got my puppy I started feeding him Purina One, thinking that I was buying really good dog food.  But then I started reading labels and information about dog food brands.  This led me to Blue Buffaloe.  Not only do they appear to make one of the best dog foods, and by that I mean healthiest, my puppy cannot get enough of this food.  That is saying something too because he was never a fan of Purina One or Eukanuba.

I ordered this item because it was on sale and because of the health benefits of green tea.  I wasn't certain how good it was going to be but I was pleasantly surprised.  It tastes refreshing and fruity.  The flavor isn't overpowering or fake.  I mix the powder in a sports bottle along with cold water and splenda.  The powder dissolves easily and the drink has a nice green tea and blueberry taste.  I was so impressed that I have signed up for automatic delivery.  It's a great product.

I like strong coffee...I LOVE strong coffee and drink it black. This coffee is not really strong but it is quite bitter and has an odd taste to it. Reminds me of 8 o clock French Roast which I also do not like. If you like 8 o clock French Roast you will likely like this one. I like San Franciscos Fog Chaser much better and make it on the stongest setting of my brewer.

My husband and I are quite fussy about our maple syrup and we usually buy ours from Canada.  We ran out and decided to try this one and what a surprise it was.  The Grade A Medium Amber from Hidden Springs Maple Vermont is simply fabulous.  Great and fast service.

This is the real deal people.  This is real Jamaican Coffee.  There are a few brands that claim to be from Blue Mountain, but they do not have that authentic taste.  My wife is Jamaican and we have been to Jamaica a few  times, but I never seem to bring back enough coffee so  I set out to find a brand here in the states that would be atleast close to what you get in Jamiaca and this is it.  Wow what flavor!

Summary: This is not hull-less popcorn! Or even close.
Text:
Bought 6lbs of this popcorn based on reviews that the hulls are softer on this Baby White than on regular popcorn. Not only are the hulls just as tough as regular popcorn, the corn pops up so tiny that it's about 1/3 hull, 2/3 popped corn per kernel! I was hoping to use this as a healthy snack for my kids who love popcorn but not the hulls.
I popped this using every tip I could find on the internet; all experiments still resulted in a tough hull.

Summary: Great quick protein for elderly w/swallowing problems
Text: I use this for my grandmother who is 88, dementia, swallowing problems. It has a fair amount of protein in it. I mix it in with other things that have a stronger flavor, like cheddar cheese soup and you really can't taste it. It does make the texture of the food a little different, a bit grainy I guess.
this is so easy on the go!  I typically make my own food for my little one but this makes it so easy when we are out running errands!  my baby loves it!

I looove these bars. I lamented no longer seeing Tropicana FruitWise bars on the market anymore; and was hoping to see something similar. I tried Target's fruit bars which while I liked the fruit leather, I didn't care for the bar's texture-- I wanted something like the fruit leather but thicker. I then found Sun Rype fruit bars and picked one up at the grocery store and was instantly hooked. These are sweet without being too sweet and are much denser and more satisfying than fruit leather strips. I could easily make a meal out of these, heh. But they're great for taking on the go since they're individually wrapped  and travel pretty well, I hope Sun Rype keeps making these delicious bars!
Bought these for the 2nd time and they were great once again.  Very fresh.  Everyone loved them, they are great to have in candy dishes for parties as something different :)
