It is just wonderful.

This is a pretty tasty bar with good texture.  Nice simple organic ingredients.  At the end of my case, I thought the taste wasn't as good they tasted like they spoiled even though the exp. date was very good.  These bars make a good snack or meal on the go.  I like to keep them in my bag for times when I'm out past my usual lunch/dinner ect.  They help keep the hunger at bay for a bit & keep you going.  They also make a nice quick meal as long as you have them with something, yogurt/kefir or the like.  The flavor is a mild chocolate nut.  I will buy again, but not by the case I think that was a bit much for me.

When I bought this I didn't think it would be so tasty. This tea has a very flavorful, sweet, natural taste. I am a big tea drinker and always hunt for a new taste and this is definitely at the top of my list.

Summary: convenient way of taking your agave with you!
Text: I was hesitant about this product based on some customer reviews that said there were difficulties opening the little sticks and that they (the customers, not the sticks) got agave all over their fingers... I wonder if Stash read the reviews and changed their packaging?  I have not had this problem, and I'm usually *awful* at opening packaging! With these, I simply bite off the end (gross, I know, but I am a student and I don't/can't carry a knife around with me in my bookbag all day) and squeeze it into my coffee.  It's a great way to have my agave with me because most coffee shops and cafes have not yet started stocking this alongside their poisonous sugar alternatives (you know, those pink, blue, and yellow packets).  Keeps my blood sugar from spiking, sweetens my coffee--what more could you ask for?

Summary: Great Gift for the Meat Lover in Your Life
Text: If you have no idea what to give the male in your life for a gift, I have discovered that carnivores like these Omaha Steaks. It is a real surprise and they get a gift that keeps on giving.
Works for me.  Some rye crackers preferred, and my rating is based on those.  This snack is otherwise very good.

this is truly the greatest coffee made for my coffee machine, delivered promptly. No hassle coffee shopping, and the best morning wake-up.
Amazon is the only place to shop, have also purchased chocolate, candles, kitchen gadgets, all have been top quality .

I loved buying a case of popchips for $13.42.  I would buy them on a regular basis if they were that price.  The product was great, the service was great also.  altogether a 5 star experience.  But now they've gone up by 70%.  Any chance of selling them to me at the original price?  Thanks, Susanne

I just bought the Keurig B70 for my husband (and myself!) for Valentines Day. We opened our brewer and chose the Caribou blend for our first ever K cup. We were surprised at how incredibly good it was! We both enjoy a good cup of medium/dark roast coffee, and this one is definetly our favorite.. I will be sending for more Caribou blend soon.. way to go Caribou!

Our dogs are not overweight, but we use this food anyway, and they really like it. There are 2 main reasons i continue to buy it:
1. The dogs never have gas problems, and 2. Their stools are always firm and easy to pick up.

Whenever we've tried something else (yes, we used high quality food, switched gradually, and gave them time to adjust) that has not been the case. It gets expensive to feed this food to two 75 pound dogs, so some day we'll probably try again to find a cheaper alternative. But in the meantime, there is an obvious difference in the dogs digestive health, so I highly recommend Nutro Natural Choice Lite.
This coffee is one of my favorites!! It is mild but full of flavor. It is sweet and delicious! I bought it on amazon since I can't find it in stores.

I ordered San Francisco Bay Coffee Fog Chaser because of the title "fog chaser" and the price was good. We were pleasantly surprised with the make up of the k-cup.  It is not all plastic, it is made up of a fiber which means, to me, less plastic for my hot coffee to run through.  I am pleased with the product and even signed up for the automatic delivery option so we don't have to be without good coffee when we get up in the morning.

This is one of my fav flavors so far. Do not let the word CREAM fool you. There is very little cream to these but they are still very flavorfull. I add either French Vanilla powdered cream or liquid cream to this and it's great.
I have it on a regular basis. The flavor does not get old or eventually give you an aftertaste.

This looked like a woman's product, so I gave it to the missus. Here's what she had to say:

I had never heard of the Clear brand before and had some doubt about the quality level. My doubt came from the low price and sort-of-cheap bottle design. I usually pay $10 to $20 for a bottle of conditioner from name brands such as Frederic Fekkai, Paul Mitchell, Redken, Pureology and The Body Shop. I didn't think it fair to compare Clear Scalp & Hair Therapy Volumizing Root Boost Nourishing Daily Conditioner with products in this price range, but I can say that the quality of the Clear conditioner is comparable with some of the conditioners mentioned above. It has nice fragrance, conditions my hair with only a small amount of liquid, makes my hair look healthy and shiny, and after using for a week, it made my hair more manageable when used together with CLEAR SCALP & HAIR BEAUTY Moisturizing Dry Scalp Nourishing Shampoo, 12.9 Fluid Ounce. Although I won't say the quality of Clear conditioner is equal or better than my favorites, I can say the cost performance of Clear conditioner is great. The only thing I don't like is the bottle design. I don't like the inexpensive-looking (well, it is inexpensive), light lavender-color, curved-shape bottle. Although I thought it's a smart idea to place the dispenser at the bottom, I wish it had a nozzle dispenser or round shape so that it's easier to hold with wet hands. When I have an empty bottle of one of my regular shampoos, I may transfer the liquid to it so that my bathroom looks better and I feel better!

First thing I did was check the ingredients. No wheat and no corn. That's good. The main ingredients are good animal protein sources.

There were two flavors in the pack I received: Chicken pot pie and sesame chicken. The sesame chicken smelled great! I literally could have been fooled into eating it myself. It had a high moisture content and the chicken was shredded. My cat at all the liquid and then went to work on the meat stuff. Shredded isn't his favorite texture at all, but he finished all 3 oz in good order.

Next was the chicken pot pie. Decent smell too. It was very watery though. My cat didn't seem to mind so why should I? He ate it all.

Bottom line...good ingredients, cat likes it. Five paws up.

Summary: I dont lik'em but the folks lov'em
Text: Am not a big fan myself, but I handed them out to many family friends and they loved these. Walnut apparently does much less damage relative to Almond and Cashew nuts.

Summary: Great flavor to spruce up that tired old cup of coffee!
Text:
HI All,

I already love Splenda so this may be a biased review. :-)
WE have a Keurig at home and usually buy the French Vanilla K-Cups.... I have recently switched to the Atkins plan and thus had to switch to the decaf French Vanilla K-Cups....they are great but very little French Vanilla flavor to be had. I saw this product on Amazon and 'click to order'..it was here in a few days. I tried it today with a cup of decaf and VOILA....it tasted great. My coffee was back...without the caffeine.

Excellent tase....very soft and not bitter to the taste buds.

5/5

ProfileName: Clark Isaacs "Clark's Eye on Books by Clark I...
Summary: Coffee that is exotic hits the mark!
Text:
We were surprised when the packages were for one cup portions. We are not used to brewing coffee this way. However, that aside, it is very easy to overcome the simple obstical and brew. We put the packages (out of the freshness wrapper of course)in the basket where we normally put the grounds.

We had to guess how many for a full pot, but we decided that one per cup would do the trick. It did and we were very happy with the results. This is a full flavored coffee and since we do not add cream or sugar, got the full benefit. This is a good product and if you have one of those single cup brewers, then this will be even better.

The only downside is that if they had some good instructions on how to brew a single cup included they would most likely have higher sales. The roast is really full flavored and delicious.

These little cheese-curl-like things have barely ANY flavor, cheddar or otherwise. And they are VERY dry. I bought a six-pack at the grocery store, but will donate most of the bags to my office's lunch room. Bleh.

Summary: sardines, tabasco, onion and swedish rye bread
Text: Sardines, Tabasco, onions on a Swedish Rye Bread is an acquired, but delicious. Of course, you get to drink a beer with that.

My furry little friend, who happens not to enjoy eating and who has turned down many cat food brands, LOVES Spots Stew chicken.

The consistency and texture are soft and fluffy, much like mousse. I am gathering by the clean plate that the flavor is just the thing to get any picky little eater to ask for seconds.

I am a bit of a Tea Crazy (I counted last week and found I have over 40 boxes at home, because I drink a TON of green and chamomile tea and have some others, too. I started drinking Oolong tea about two years ago and really enjoyed it - this one is no exception. You could add honey to it but it tastes very flavourful and sweet without. There's no bitterness to it like there is with some herbal teas without honey. It's a really nice lunchtime/afternoon relaxing tea to have!
you should not expect this kind of cookies taste nice. it is OK for you to stuff your empty stomach when you are starving and easy to take. and that's all.

Summary: Rip Off...price is over the top!
Text: Product is great...price is absolutely a rip off.  Another poster mention going to Bell Plantation direct...much better and normal pricing or netrition.com.  One jar at netrition is 3.99

Ordered malossol salmon caviar, received some orange mess in a regular green tin. Brave soul that I am - I have actually tried this nonsense. It does not come even close to resembling what a fresh, properly handled caviar should taste like. If I am still alive in 2 hours I guess you can call it "edible".

This is easily the best potato chip that I have ever had. Look at the ingredients: Ginger and 3 types of hot pepper. How can you go wrong?

Obviously, not for you if you don't like spicy food. But, if you DO like spicy food, you'll probably love these. They have that hot-with-a-hint-of-sweetness flavor combo that is prevalent in a lot of Thai food.

In the stressful world we live in it's nice to relax with a warm cup of Natural Calm Magnesium at the end of the day - I get better results with this product than any magnesium pill I've tried.  My kids love it too and say it helps them fall asleep faster.  Arrived quick, and a better price than at the local store!

I saw this Chai Tea when I was shopping here for the Tazo Chai Tea. I read the 3 reviews which all gave 5 stars so decided to give it a try. I have to say I am totally disappointed.

No real flavor what so ever. I was expecting a Chai Tea with a little bit of bite and I got quite a bit of nothing. The description written up by the manufacture made the tea sound wonderful. Again the 5 stars by the reviews sold me, the taste did not.

I would never recommend this tea to anyone, and as for me I'm sticking with Tazo.

I was looking for a good deal on Pure Almond Extract, and I found a great price, and it also happens to be organic!  I've used this several times since ordering it, and so has my girlfriend, and we both love it.  It gives our baked goods such a warm and lovely flavor when mixed with vanilla, we plan on keeping it in stock at least one full bottle ahead of running out!  It's a better deal than we can find at any local grocer.

I've started giving these to 2 of my dogs which are a very large breed.  They aren't really old yet, but we have mostly wood and tile floors which are hard on their joints.  So I've started giving them these in hopes of preventing - to some extent - damage and pain for them. They love these.  My small dog isn't very old, but wants them, too.  I don't think they are so good for her since she has thrown them up before.  The pieces are fairly large so the dog knows she's getting a real treat.  I haven't found any flavor that they don't like, although the Beef seems to be their favorite.  I like that they seem to be a made in the USA product since I lost a dog during the "bad dog food" epidemic. Since then, I've been very careful what I give my dogs.

Summary: A counter to the negative reviews
Text:
I can't comment on the flavor since I just bought it yesterday. I gave this 5 stars only to counterbalance the incorrect 1-star reviews regarding the ingredients.

This oil is an INFUSED oil, made with truffle extract. Not an 'aroma', not an 'essence' and not made with "2,4-dithiapentane" and other chemicals. Extract is made by putting truffles in oil to make a very strong flavor and then using the over-strong results in something else. Like vanilla extract - that stuff is NASTY when tasted straight from the bottle, but magical when added sparingly to other dishes.

My tin has only 2 ingredients listed and the lable says "Infused". The 2 ingredients are Organic Sunflower Oil and Black Truffle Extract. That's it. The tin keeps light out much better than a darkened bottle (or a clear one!). It's also sold locally at Whole Foods and Bristol Farms.

I'll review later after I've actually tasted it. But I look very carefully at labels before purchasing items like this. La Tourangelle is one of the few that has no other junk added.

Summary: Always have my doggie bags with me when we walk!
Text: These are great and they fit right on my leash.  No matter where we go, I have a bag  handy.  I would highly recommend these!

I love Larabars- I like to keep one on me in case I get super hungry when I'm out and about because the protein and fat content makes them very filling. Because I'm gluten intolerant and also do not eat highly processed foods, it can be pretty difficult to find something to eat away from home, but when I get really hungry I get ill anyway. Larabars have saved my butt more times than I can count- I like the coconut cream and peanut butter chocolate chip ones the best and they have a little less fat too!
Plus, only a few ingredients. Perfection!

Summary: Great coffee at a good price.
Text: You can't go wrong here. Order these fresh roasted beans and brew some up. I guarantee you will order more.
I like just dropping the filter pack (or two or three)in my coffee pot, filling the water chamber... tasty coffee- no mess.

amazon sent a replacement after my original arrived broken down and covered with ants!
The second one was overnighted broken too- but the outer box was undamaged. Of course amazon
customer service is amazing- and refunded my money. will try to stick to plastic..

Had never heard of this brand before, however the price was right for ordering.  Turns out the family likes this better than the Swiss Miss K-cups we had been using.  Will continue to buy, will continue to use.  Don't forget to buy the mini-marshmallows at the store!

The product has a very bad description, so I though I need to write some details. It does not specify the size, but great that they say it's 100% natural.
So, it smells bad and looks very small, but my dog loves it! Maybe it's just small for my 100 lbs Cane Corso... On the back of the pack it says to give 2-3 stix a day for dogs that size. Each stick is about 5 in long and 1/2 in diameter. They are very hard, but my dog does not have any problems chewing it. It goes away in about 1 min. When he fells that he is going to get it, he starts "dancing".
I cannot say anything about its function, my dog only got stix few times. But he likes them even though they have a terrible smell. I would buy again.

My mom gave me a box of this a few years ago and I had just recently gotten around to trying it. It was excellent. I bought another box and the second I opened the first packet I could smell that they had changed the recipe. Checking the back of the two boxes confirmed it. Cinnamon is about all I taste when I drink it, although the aftertaste has a hint of clove. Pretty expensive for something that tastes mixed by a child.

Summary: most of the chips were in very  very small pieces bad shipping
Text: chips were very good but there must have been a shipping problem all the chips were in small pieces

ProfileName: Jason A. Teeple "Nobody made a greater mistak...
Text: Get the movie or sound track and sing along with Carol King. This is great stuff, my whole extended family knows these songs by heart. Quality kids storytelling and music.

Summary: Enjoyed by all the guys in the house
Text: This 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner has a great fresh scent and washes hair well, leaving it soft, but not greasy feeling. It lathers up well and washes out cleanly. A very guy friendly scent, not feminine. This shampoo is most loved by my pre-teen son, who prior to this had been using a more kid like version of a 2-in-1 shampoo. He likes this Clear Men Scalp Therapy quite a bit better, and has claimed the remainder of the bottle as his. The only issue I have with it is this brands bottles of shampoo and conditioner don't always ship well. After receiving 4 bottles of Clear Scalp shampoo/conditioner, 2 our of the 4 bottles had leaked just a tiny bit during transport. They are packaged in plastic bags to help in case leaking, but when it came to my orders, 50% of them were leaking in some way upon arrival.

Like others have said, hanging this up is useless. You have to lie it down in an area where the flies like to land. I have caught dozens and dozens of flies with this, however I have noticed that some of these traps are stickier than others. The flies in my house also seem to have figured out how to basically "walk" down the trap until they get to the end, where they can get unstuck and fly off. Maybe 25% of the flies escape, and the others are trapped. I actually have taken to pressing the flies into the trap once they land, to try to keep them from escaping, but this is disturbing and I'd rather not have to do that. The Catchmaster Window glue trap is really superior to this product by comparison (but is currently unavailable...).

Summary: I just love these, they have such a good flavor!
Text: I really love the taste of this particular rice cake. I can't find them locally, as I can't a lot of stuff, so am glad for Amazon.

Salada Asian Plum White tea is a light tasting tea with just a hint of plum flavoring in each sip. Some people, like Dr. Oz, claim that white tea has more beneficial qualities than the more popular green tea. Try it. I think you'll like it.

Summary: Effective for H pylori, Be Prepared for Bitter Taste
Text:
My nutritionist wants me to use this when ever my stomach acid gets out of hand and causes esophogeal spasms(no more than 3x/day). He said I wouldn't need much and I believe he was right! This stuff tastes aweful but I'm well aware it's a medicinal herb.

I can't give less ratings because of taste - that wouldn't be fair. Just be prepared for something very bitter, suck it up, and use it for the health benefits it offers.

I also can't give this 5 stars because the zip-lock bag it came in was cheap and it took a very long time to ship. Shipping was way too expensive too. Being a prime member, I guess I've been spoiled.

Be sure to try a little first to make sure you'll be OK with it too. Other than that, it was harmless.
Our yorkie and shitzu love greenies and the price at amazon is significantly lower than what I can find at petsmart or Petco. I will continue to buy from Amazon

Summary: Nice Coffee, Pods Didn't Work for Us
Text:
I really love the idea of this coffee from the family of Bob Marley. However, it's packaged in individual pods that work in a Keurig adapter cup, so if you don't have that kind of coffee maker/adapter, this product isn't for you.

Not wanting to waste the coffee, I cut up a bunch and brewed in a regular machine. Overall, it's a fairly mild roast with good strong coffee flavor (if you use enough of it) that has some nice fruity tones.

Summary: She'd stand on her head for this!
Text: I ordered both this type and the Paella for our Akita, and I have to say hands down, this is the only food that she gets excited about about EVERY time. She is a picky eater, and sometimes the other food, has to be put in the refrigerator because I don't want it to spoil. I don't give her this "flavor" all the time though, because I want it to be more of a reward type meal. Have not tried the Kobe flavors yet, but am looking forward to...am waiting for the economy to pick up a bit more to try these ones just in case she is not as crazy about these as she is the pork version.
Excellent heat though it has a bit too much smoke for my taste. Just a little dab will do ya when it comes to the heat. If you use too much the smoke flavor can be a bit overwhelming.
Great tasting coffee.  I would have rated it a 5 if it were  less expensive. I use a burr grinder and a simple drip machine.
it is one of my favorite teas. Contain blue berry fruits + other flower pellets. Great taste.

The front of the box boasts, "Low Sodium - No Cholesterol - Low Fat". "100% Pure Roasted Whole Grain Buckwheat". "Wheat & Gluten Free".

Ingredients: "100% pure buckwheat - contains no additives, fortifiers or preservatives."
"170 calories per 1/4 cup serving. About 3/4 cup prepared."

Flavor? That depends on you. The directions recommend adding bouillon but a lot of bouillon just winds up being chunks of MSG. Most recently I tried adding some jamaican jerk flavoring and it worked well. You can use this as a base, throwing other ingredients, veggies, etc. to turn this into your own creation. This cooks up in maybe fifteen minutes.

Only drawback, which may not be a nuisance to you, is that preparation as directed uses two pans, one to boil the liquid ingredients and a second to griddle up the kasha with egg coating before combining the two into one pan. That's not enough of a drawback to prevent me from stocking up on more Wolff's Kasha.

Crunchy addiction

I treat my cats to 8 different Temptations flavors, and they love them all. I'm sure that giving them different flavors means more to me, than it does to my cats; they don't seem to chew them long enough to taste them. But they insist on two or three each time they come in the house, I'm sure it's a form of addiction. I'm buying these on the "Subscribe & Save" program, which save money and time compared to buying them locally.

Cats love these things!

I'm generally not a fan of Hazelnut coffee but even I like this one.  My husband tried this in a sample pack and loved it so I ordered them for him.  I was surprised that the cups arrived loose in the shipping box so make sure you have a container for them as this box doesn't exactly fit in the cabinet the way the small retail boxes do.  That said this coffee has a nice bold taste which works great in a big mug.  We will definitely buy more of these.

Summary: not the best quality or price
Text:
I first purchased this product for $28.00 and that was a good deal, but they just had to raise there
price to over $32.00 for (6) 16oz packs and they are now to costly.
The Bob's (4) 32oz packs at $32.78 is a much better deal and I believe a better product.
You get a total of 104oz with Bob's, and only 96oz with Eden.

USE A RICE COOKER

Forget the directions and use one part Quinoa to two parts water. (Like you are making oatmeal)
It will then be a better replacement for rice, much healthier, and with the added benefit of adding fiber which will definitely clean you out.
I also don't wash it as directed, as you would have to do with red Quinoa, and the washing can loose a lot of the product down the drain.

Summary: Best wild rice you can buy
Text:
I've tried them all... This stuff is pricey,, but when you open the bag, it smells like fresh green tea... Cooks up fluffy with good snap.. great flavor..
I agree with the last guy,, best rice I have ever had,
We used these for a church function and they were great. Good taste and value. Since we have actually seen some local restaurants using these exact cookies.
Great price for a huge container of the most flavorful Jelly Belly Jelly Beans.  Mmmmm!  Excellent seller, great price and fast delivery.

This coffee smells good when brewing but there is no vanilla scent at all. We thought that would be a bad sign but when we tasted it, the coffee was very good, even served black. The vanilla taste is very subtle. I served this coffee to family and friends and everyone liked it. My daughter said it was very smooth and she liked that the vanilla taste was subtle.

Excellent flavor in what are very fresh beans. I have now received multiple bags of this item and the quality has been very consistent so far. As another reviewer indicated, potential buyers should be aware that these are minimally processed cacao beans which are NOT chocolate.

Summary: Dry Cookie Bits, and Bits and More Bits
Text: These cookies were ok, just ok.  I may have been inclined to give them three stars had they arrived as whole cookies, every last cookies was broken.  I understand this is probably due to poor packaging.  The consistency was a bit grainy and dry though.  And milk did not help.  Next time I'll purchase a chewy brand or Mrs. Fields.

Summary: Must use conditioner for scalp benefits and SMELLS TERRIBLE
Text:
I wanted to try this product because some members of our family have easily irritated scalps. We were very disappointed. First, the bottle indicates that the scalp benefits are only indicated when the conditioner is also used, so I bet the shampoo does little or nothing to help your scalp. The other thing is that the shampoo smells awful and everyone refused to use it.

Pros: It might help your scalp, but only if you use the conditioner

Cons:
Have to use the condition to get scalp benefits.
Smells terrible.

I saw the company was offering a "buy-one-get-one-free" coupon offer on their website and although I did not partake on it, the offerings interested me greatly. Two Whole Foods and a gourmet deli search later, I found a local place that finally had it in stock. They did not have the flavor I wanted but I chose this instead.

I don't like the taste of flavored waters most of the time but I was in need of a beverage after a long work day and I was glad to have found it. Upon opening a bottle, I suggest smelling it! The aroma is a precursor of the natural thrill to come. I am not a fan of anything minty, but when I began to drink it I was taken aback by how smooth and refreshing it really is. The tastes are of a medium distinction so if anyone is concerned about the strength I suggest you shouldn't worry.

The best part was the clearing of my nostrils afterwards! I couldn't believe that part. I look forward to trying the others (if I can find more places near me). I give this a "yea"!

The cashew cookie larabar is my favorite.  It's nice to have an all natural non-processed bar that isn't stuffed with extra vitamins.  The taste is simple and delicious.  Works well for breakfast or a snack on the go.  I didn't like the other flavors as well.
San Francisco Bay Coffee Company makes the best coffee for the Kuerig by far.  It's also half the price.  It's always nice to have someone break a monopoly.

I really wanted to like this product. I though it might be a nice alternative to the iced-coffee I drink during the summer; and I REALLY liked the idea that it had vitamins.

LIKES
--Two squirts in a cup of cold water produced a refreshing drink. It tasted 'fruit punchy' and crisp.
--Bottle was easy to use and didn't leak.

DISLIKES
--After five minutes I suddenly discovered an after-taste that persisted for more than fifteen minutes. Meh.

WISHFUL THINKING
--Wish they had used another sweetner.
--Wish they'd come out with a kid's version without caffeine.

Conclusion
I think this product is well priced. I think the initial flavor is really nice, but the after taste popped up after awhile which sort of detracted from the overall experience. You might try this in iced tea.

Pam T~

I have been gluten free for over 2 years. I have had the attitude, "If I can't eat it I'm not cooking it", since that time. This is the first time I have tried a gluten free box mix. I made the lasagna (with turkey) and added a bit of mozzarella and parm cheese on top and it is gone!! I can't remember what hamburger helper tasted like, but this was good! I was shocked at how much the family liked it... time to try the rest!!

Nothing beats the actual coconut but this comes a close second! Make sure you chill this to the max, it tastes better that way.

It's not an item I would buy--maybe every once in a while.

Give it a try--at least once.

This is a magnificent tea and I have noticed it has helped clear up my skin. That along with Supercritical Omega 7 by New Chapter, my skin looks 10 years younger at 40! This tea contains Dandelion which is beyond exceptional for liver detox and skin health. I have also noticed a caffeine like feeling after just one cup because of all of the nutrients. Excellent flavor! It's the only detox tea I drink.

This mango Zico I've only had for the first time.  It issooooo delicious. and if it's all what it says (more potassium than a banana,zero sugar, better than sports drinks, etc), then that's FANTASTIC. Also it arrived quickly and in great condition. I will definately order again and will try other flavors as well. YUM!!!!!
These are great esp if u r on paleo diet !  They r not spicy n fact we pull the casing off for our 14 month old baby to eat !

On a whim I purchased this item in an effort to eliminate the sticky mess that dripping honey made on my bedside table.  The granulated honey works beautifully.  There is absolutely no mess and the granules have a taste remarkably close to real honey.  I still prefer the real thing but this keeps everything neat and not sticky!  This will also be a good addition to my tea parties with friends.

Summary: Stash Premium Fusion Red, White & Blueberry Tea
Text:
Amazing tea.

That pretty much sums it up - it's an amazing tea. The taste is sweet and the smell is strong and also sweet. I love waking up, steeping a teabag with two teaspoons of cane sugar and half water half milk mixture. Adding milk gives the tea an amazing body and unlike a reviewer said below, there is no notes of green olives nor of cough syrup - this tea is simply astounding.

I've tried Stash's Mango/Passion fusion and their Chai tea but didn't care for those, then I stumbled upon this one and O-M-G is all I had to say. The Chai has a somewhat bitter aftertaste and the Mango/Passion is forgettable on the palette. This tea however I love. The smell like I said is strong, super strong, and sweet. The taste is also amazing, very fruity and very very endearing. However, on the downside, I would not recommend that you make this tea with water alone, although it is a very smooth tea, it lacks body - thus, like I said before, make it as follows:

Steep in 4oz hot water with 2 teaspoons of cane sugar (or substitute your own)
Add 4oz warm milk

The milk as I said gives it extra body that the tea lacks, however it is forgiveable. Stash truly hit the mark on this one and hopefully they don't discontinue it - because the day they do discontinue it, I will be a very very sad man :(

Summary: Tastes like standard pasta, the kids can't tell the difference
Text: This pasta tastes good. If you are going to eat pasta, why not get the most out of anything you eat and not just empty carbs? This is a good product.

I have two westies and a maltese. After trying many brands of canned dog food that my dogs would not eat we finally discovered these. All three of my dogs love this dog food. They enjoy many of the different flavors. The trays are not large but are just right for one serving for dogs about 20 pounds and under.

These are scrumptious and easy to snack, a hold me over to the Girl Scouts have their tag a longs again next year.  (This review is for the Peanut Butter Oreo Fudge Cream).  These were super yummy.  Peanut Butter, Fudge, Cookie a little milk and a slight sugar shock later I was totally at peace with the world and a-okay that my day had been brutal. These are a little chewy so not that crisp snap of a tag a long, but hits all the right flavor receptors.  Thank you oreo!

I've tried more than 20 K-cups found on Amazon since purchasing my machine in early 2009. To give an idea of what other blends I enjoy-Donut Shop, Wolfgang Puck Vienna, Kona Blend, Gloria Jeans Hazelnut-so generally medium roasts with decent but not overpowering coffee flavor. This is my favorite. It is a very smooth aromatic cup of coffee with a wisp of nut flavor. I usually add a bit of creamer and a splenda to my coffee. This is perfect. I like it on all settings but I tend to use the medium most.

Yes the coffee is good and it came nice and quick, the last time I bought this coffee from amazon it was from another seller, and the coffee was outdated. This was not outdated and I will be buying more coffee from this seller. Keep up the good work looking forward to getting fresh coffee from you again. Marcel

My kids, ages twelve and fourteen, love these things better than they love their dad.  With boiling water, they think themselves to be gourmet chefs... this is like, "food of the gods" for them when they come home "starving" from school.  For parents, that's a great thing.  Trader Joe's sells this product for about $2 apiece.  I wish I could find them online for less, or at least a comparable price.  I have to drive about 100 miles to find a TJ's.  I grab a bucketload of these every time I drive there.
...a little expensive,and somewhat runny in texture, but yummy. Prefer the one made by the Swiss company, the name escapes me, but could not find that at Amazon. Arrived promptly from the seller.
No one ever notices a difference between these brownies and those made with wheat flour. They are moist, chocolatey, and delicious.

Summary: Try it vegetarian - the right amount of savory/spicy/sweet
Text:
This was a breeze to make. I added a very large boneless chicken breast in bite-sized pieces (much less in quantity than the recommended amount of beef) and added diced onions, sliced carrots, peas, and diced sweet potato. I was tempted to make it a totally vegetarian meal, because my husband will not eat beef, and he really does not like meat much at all. but for flavor, and to cut fat, I cooked the chicken and veggies in a bit of coconut oil. Delicious. It's true that the coconut powder gets lumpy, but I followed some advice to whisk it up prior to adding it. Tasted similar to the veggie curry I make with curry paste and coconut milk, but not quite as creamy. The added crunchiness of some of the ingredients (peanuts, coconut) added to that made it even more appealing.

I just love coconut curry. There is something about the savory/spicy/sweetness that is appealing to me. I added more chili from a spice bottle. I don't have experience with the "real thing", as I don't travel to other countries, or try many ethnic restaurants. I just knew this was a coconut curry, and that is how I prepare it. The chicken was so flavorful, as were the vegetables. (the sweet potato -- WOW!) The sauce permeates everything. Very fragrant.

I have been going back and forth in my mind about the price. I decided that since I am the only curry lover in this house, it just doesn't pay to get the curry paste jars and store them. Coconut milk, which IS creamier, I do buy the premium brand. So, it is costly to buy the ingredients to make it by scratch if you aren't going to use the rest of the curry paste before it goes bad. If you add the peanuts and such to the cost per package, you are talking bucks!

So, for a novelty, I believe the price is justified. This package makes quite a bit, so after two people eating, there are leftovers, and I froze them immediately after cooling. Heated back up, the consistency isn't as good, but passable.

I would buy this, but just not in a case. I have no room. The only cases I buy from Amazon (and I shop here a lot) are of bottles of a name brand jalapeno sauce. I go through that fast! But if you want a good curry, and you eat it a lot, I recommend buying it from Amazon.

I have been a tea drinker all of my life. When I bought my Keurig coffee maker I was delighted to learn that I could make tea also. At the time I needed to drink only Decaf and after trying a few different brands which are hard to find I ordered Twinings Decaf tea and was so happy to taste such a good cup of tea. It tasted so similar to the regular Twinings tea that you wouldn't it was decaf. I am a satisfied customer

Summary: Fromm Four-Star Surf & Turf vs Blue Buffalo Wilderness Salmon
Text: My 2 Minature Schnauzers are 3yrs old and picky eaters. They were occassionaly spoiled by me adding chicken breast or turkey to their dry food. They eventually got bored of the Fromm Surf & Turf but for the first month loved to eat it. Yes, it's more expensive than the other dry foods but the ingredients used helped my prevent break-outs that one of my dogs were experiencing from allergies. I switched them to the Blue Buffalo Wilderness and it has higher protein and Omega fatty acids. The dogs enjoyed the change in food but it gave them both gas and one of them had diarrhea. I like the ingredients of the Blue Buffalo but according to my vet some owners are complaining about the same effects on their dogs because it's very rich. I'm remaining with the Fromm simply because of the quality and it's grain less so it helps my dog with allergies.
Love the chocolate and creamy goodness and it's oh so bad for you. Promptly shipped as ordered.

The tea that is described is "jasmine pearl tea", and so is the image that accompanies this item. the tea is in fact NOT jasmine pearl tea, but rather an almost comicaly (and somewhat insulting) inferior grade of tea. if jasmine tea still has flowers in it, it's what you might call "bottom of the barrel" tea. that's what was sent to me, not the coveted jasmine pearls that are described and shown.
I can't help but feel a little bit DUPPED by the whole transaction, and I likely won't be purchasing anything from this seller ever again.
once more, BEWARE: THE PRODUCT DESCRIBED AND PICTURED ABOVE IS MISLEADINGLY INCORRECT. this tea is NOT jasmine pearl, it's low grade full leaf tea. I'm saddened by the fact that I purchased a whole pound of this stuff. you've been warned :)

This product was much better than I thought it would be. I thought that any jello that didn't have to be refrigerated would be very rubbery in texture but this jello
isn't much different than the stuff you get in the refrigerated section of the grocery store. The lime flavor along with the pineapple chunks gives it a very nice flavor. Obviously jello from scratch is better but it doesn't do very well unrefrigerated (like in a school lunch bag).

FYI,

1. Amazon calls this a "24 pack" which is actually 6 packs of 4 cups each that totals 24 cups per order.

2. I ordered this product when the temp. outside was in the low 90's and the jello didn't seem to be affected. I don't know how it would hold up in the high 90's to 100's since it has to travel around in the truck all day in the heat.

I have been feeding my dog Holistic Select Radiant Adult Health Lamb Meal Formula for approximately 4 yrs.  He loves it and, in my view, it is a very healthy dog formula. I purchased this product because my dog had a urinary infection due to crystals in his urine when he was a small pup and my vet suggested I change his diet to a formula with a lower percentage of protein.  My dog has not had any problems since using Holistic Select. I rate this product 5 stars.

I love coffee, I love mochas, I love amaretto.
This product however was disgusting !!!
This is my favorite snack! I often eat these chips as a meal when I'm on the run. (The lemon adds just the right amount of zip.) They're also terrific as a topping for soups or salads.

Summary: not a bad caviar for price.
Text: we will order again!our grandkids wanted to try caviar. We didn't want to spend a fortune if they did not like. we were actually pleasantly surprised with quality.

I was excited to find these to help with training. I break them in half so I can give our 4 month lab more rewards. She likes them and they don't leave a mess in my pocket. The downside: giving her as few as three treats causes her to have horrible gas. I stopped giving them to her for a few days and the gas stopped. I'm going to try something different for treats or maybe a different flavor. We have the chicken n' cherries.

I have bought these from the grocery store before (I like the weight management because my dogs are fat but I love to give them treats). They were not this dry from the grocery. I understand that they have to be a little dry, since they are low fat to begin with. Still, they seem a little discolored.

The dogs still eat them (no surprise there)... but I don't think I'll order these treats from Amazon again.

These pods perform poorly in my espresso machine while ground beans perform very well. It could be the filter for the pods but the espresso comes out uneven from the spouts and the flavor is not very strong.

I love this coffee. I do wish it came already ground as I don't have a grinder and use a blender instead. But it's worth it. Many flavored coffees I've tried only seem to have a flavored odor that doesn't reach the coffee, but this one manages both.

Summary: Just "meh" - Definiately not a healthy choice!
Text: Chock full of sugar!  Absolutely not something I would serve to my family.  Obviously, all cookies have sugar in them, but these seem to be a bit excessive.

My selection, which contained 12 cans each of Chicken Pot Pie and Sesame Chicken, arrived quickly, and I looked forward to seeing how my kitties would like it.

I liked the fact that:

(1) Petite Cuisine has NO Wheat Gluten,

and

(2) it's made from "Human Grade" ingredients -- which means even I can eat it if I really wanted to -- and truth be told -- I DID sample a bit from each of those 2 selections -- and both selections tasted better than anything I have tasted when I buy a Brand Name can of canned chicken for myself.....

But ok -- this Petite Cuisine is for my kitties, so let's see what THEY think of it:

Well, I had no idea what to expect when I opened the first can -- Chicken Pot Pie (and word of caution -- open the "Chicken Pot Pie" can over the sink--there's alot of Broth inside and it sloshes out if you are not careful).

However, Big Bad Baby Twinkle was standing behind me watching my every move, and once the top came off the can, her Supreme Largeness, BBBT, surprised me with several OCTAVES worth of Mew-sical praise for the tempting smell.

Yes - I know you are supposed to mix new cat food with their old food, but I had no desire to mix this pristine, tasty, fresh diced chicken and veggies entree with any of their stinky canned stuff - so Big Bad Baby Twinkle and Sweet Cee Cee feasted on 1/2 can of "Chicken Pot Pie" each, along with the liquid broth. I waited for a reaction -- nothing untoward happened. They licked their chops and came after me for more of the same.

Now, it has been noted that there is alot of "water" (Broth) in this can of Chicken pot Pie -- I am familiar with "Spot's Stew" and that brand also has alot of liquid in its can. I have no problem with this Chicken Pot Pie broth -- if anything, it helps to hydrate my kitties (cats, being descended from desert animals -- get most of their liquid from their food-- and as long as the sodium content of this broth is low, then they can slurp it to their hearts delight -- and they certainly did, as the dishes were licked clean)

The Sesame Chicken, was less liquidy and looked very nice, shredded with its vegetables -- it had special smell, which actually was just the smell of Sesame Oil. But my cats inhaled this as greedily as they did the Chicken pot Pie. I was impressed that Sesame oil would be used (along with Soy oil) as an ingredient. I'm looking forward to seeing what these oils will eventually do to nourish (former abandoned, street-kitty, but thoroughly vetted) Cee Cee's somewhat dull coat. * * *

And to top off the Petite Cuisine experience, each box comes with a coupon worth $2 -- $1 off when you buy a four-pack, or four cans of Petite Cuisine from the supermarket -- and another $1 coupon will be sent to you if you fill out your name and address on the first coupon before you present it to the check out clerk.

The only thing I take an issue with is the origin -- Thailand -- why not keep this "at home" and produce it in the USA?

* * *UPDATE -- Dec 18 2008 -- Cee Cee's coat grew out a little more, is BEAUTIFUL and silky!! Since the only new thing in her life is this food, I can surmise that this diet of Petite Cuisine DID help flesh her out and beautify her fur (She is a former street-kitty, and has always been a little wan (although she goes to the vet regularly) since she was rescued and I brought her inside.)
A lot of tea for the price... ...no sweetener needed... The product works better than I expected it to. I also didn't realize how much I was ordering. I am enjoying this product. Has very good taste.

ProfileName: Eco Mama's Guide To Living Green "www.ecomama...
Text: Apparently, many groats are steamed to preserve them, thus making them no longer a raw food.  I got these because I understood them to be raw and sproutable--well they won't sprout, however, they are still considered raw.  For my purposes, I soaked them, dehydrated them, then ground them into a flour for raw cowboy cookies.  They were the right groats for this purpose, but I was confused when they didn't actually sprout after being soaked.  I emailed the company, and they got back to me immediately and were very friendly and patient in helping me out--couldn't have been nicer or more helpful.  The cookies turned out great, by the way.
this really makes things simple....you can add stuff to these packets to make it your own ! everyone who's tried my jerky has loved it.

Summary: This Should be Called - "OMG ie The -ishest TEA Ever Tea"
Text:
So I'm so disappointed in myself for not tracking this tea down for home use earlier. I've encountered it on my many trips to Seattle, but never was motivated to make it a regular brewing pleasure at my house. This tea has all but completely displaced my morning coffee as it seems to pack a much more potent punch to the cardio system than does the 3x shot Latte (although I don't claim empirical data to support that).

It has an incredible aroma, which to me is like breathing in sunshine - a definite plus during the winter months of the Northwest. I use a French Press to brew the loose leaf variety but the teabags work just as well.

If your a fan of strong spiced tea, don't hesitate to purchase and become a regular.

On the business side, there is nothing to worry about. Quick shipping, great quality, local business... what more do you want?
I had tried this coffee before, it is wonderful.  Smooth and rich, full flavored, but not too bold. I would recommend it to anyone.
I bought 5 boxes of greenies, 2 for my dog and 3 for my friend's dog and the dogs go crazy about greenies!
This product, cereal, arrived on time and was as as good as expected.  What more can I say about cereal?
As always, we received a great product.  Our furbabies love these!!  We will continue to do business with them!!  Quick delivery as a reasonable cost too!

Summary: Great for Low Carb.  Added Cream Cheese Icing!
Text: I thought these were very good for low carb. Net 1 carb and only 36 calories for a very big muffin!  I mixed some Torani sugar free vanilla syrup into some cream cheese and frosted them with that.  Delicious.  Definitely will be buying more.  Love coconut so not a problem for me.  Husband and Daughter loved them as well and they are not low carb dieters.
I did not recieve what the item said. It was suppose to be a variety pack, but they were all the same.

My baby is in love with these puffs. When we bring out the container, he gets so excited! They melt nicely in his mouth, which is good because he sometimes likes to stuff his mouth with a few at a time. Not only are they (to my knowledge the only) organic puffs, but they also have a fraction of the sugar compared to other brands.

My baby loves the green, banana, and apple flavors. I've tasted them too (I couldn't resist), and they're not too shabby. After all, I would never feed anything to my baby that I couldn't stand to eat myself.

As far as the quantity goes, I was at first wary of buying a 6-pack. However, my baby loves these so much, that we'll definitely use them before he outgrows them or they expire.
Daughter loves this soup but it is so expensive at the health foods store so when I saw it on Amazon where I can have savings of over one dollar a can I jumped on this deal.
These are delicious... my friends can't seem to get enough of these when they come over, in fact they tend to leave with a pocket full.

I made this for my 12 year old grandson.  "Grandma this is the best hot chocolate I have ever had in my whole life!"  You can guess what he got for Christmas.  It really has a wonderful flavor.  Top it off with whipped cream.

Found this EXTRA LARGE jar on Amazon.  This was a birthday present for my 28 year old son. This is an English staple, spread on buttered toast.  The taste is heaven although requires a taste adjustment to get used to.  Once you like it you have to have it around all the time.  Sometimes hard to find in stores, but very easy on Amazon. Get Some Today!!
I bought some of these at the local Menards and have been a fan ever since.  As soon as I ran out of the bag I had, I ordered a case from Amazon.  Very good snack.
I really like these chocolates, but they are hard to find. I am a fan of dard chocolate, and these are some of my favorites
This is my favorite coffee.  I like a strongly flavored brew and this fills the bill and the "smokey flavor" is an enhancement I like.

I have had considerable trouble finding coffee pods in supermarkets for my Black and Decker Home Cafe, so was very pleased to find I can easily order them from Amazon.  My coffee maker is no longer being manufactured and seems to have been replaced by very expensive one-cup-at-a-time coffee machines.  I prefer the convenience and taste of coffee from my machine so will continue to order pods on line.

Good price for a pack of two. However after sampling lots of different brands, my two preferred are Starbucks and Caribou. It all depends on your personal taste preference. I suggest a variety pack if you're not sure.

I was about to give away my Keurig until I encountered this coffee.  All other K-cups, no matter what brand, are simply TOO strong.  Timothy's Decaf is heaven compared to what I have been drinking.  I actually had resorted to buying coffee pods and using a nice holder sold here at Amazon to hold the pods in place so they could be treated like a K-Cup.  So if you have been thinking along the same lines, consider Timothy's.  I have had their regular coffees, my next order will be for full caffeine K-cups from them for my morning cup.  This PM cup of Timothy's decaf is the first good coffee I have had since I purchased a Keurig.

I am on a low carb diet and have lost 25 pounds.  I was so tired of eating meat all the time but too nervous to splurge on pasta until I came across this product on Amazon.  I cook it a minute or two longer than the directions and top it with full fat Greek yogurt and parm cheese and one serving is so filling and yummy.  Definitely cures my cravings and am now on subscribe and save.  My hubby and son love it too!

Summary: Perfect!  Fruity and smooth Green & Black tea!
Text:
Wow, I love this tea! It's a mixture of green and black with medium-bold fruity flavors! It's smooth, refreshing, rich and interesting. Smelling the bag was a little overpowering, but the taste is divine!

This is a good tea if you want to have the green tea benefits, but not have a boring tea!

Black tea is left to oxidize a little longer than green tea, so it loses some of it's antioxidants. Adding green tea back into a flavorful, fruity mixture like this makes it very healthy.

What a great idea Harney & Sons!

I don't know what has happened to formulation or processing of the "big name" Earl Grey teas in the past several years, but the quality of those had degraded to such an extent that I went looking for a replacement. I am happy to say that I have found it in spades in this brand!  The bergamot comes through not only in the aroma but also the taste. (I also really like the color of the box!) This company also makes a "double bergamot" Earl Grey but I actually prefer the regular (this one) to the double. If you have become unhappy with your current Earl Grey, I recommend that you give this one a try.
All I can say is, this is an excellent buy and good crackers. Worth every penny.

Summary: Decent tea for a moderately picky tea lover
Text: I am not a real connoisseur of loose teas, but I do like decent black tea with no added flavors, just loose black tea like indian or ceylon teas or maybe some blends like irish or english breakfast. This is a perfect example - relatively inexpensive but good tasting with full, rich flavor. Perfect for someone who would not settle for teabags, but is also not into exquisite expensive teas.
My schnauzer will eat just about anything, but my lhasa will turn up her nose at some treats.  She absolutely loves these biscuits and makes quite a fuss if we forget to give her one after her walk.

This coffee is quite flavourful, but you can taste the nut flavour more than the banana. I found this a bit dissapointing. As well, I like my coffee weak, but find I need to add more than my usual amount to get the strength I like.

My husband is a huge fan of hot cocoa.  I surprised him with a 6-pack of Stephen's Peanut Butter Cup Hot Cocoa.  It actually has little peanut butter cups in it.  They quickly melt into this delicious treat.  We highly recommend this product and will buy it again.

I've been overpaying for the last year at Walmart and Target for the Arm & Hammer scented baggies until I found these online.  When they arrived, the first thing I did was smell them.  It sounds crazy, but the scents are really nice for drowning out other smells!  These are a nice fresh scent and not overwhelming.  I primarily use these at our changing table in my daughter's nursery.  I also keep a roll in each diaper bag, in the glove box of both vehicles, and in my purse.  Nasty diapers are the first thing to find their way into one of these, but I've used them for garbage in the car too.  Will be a return customer for sure!  They're perfect!

This is the only one treat my dog really gets into.
Every time I struggled to sneak out from the house and leave my dog behind,
this treat is the only one works for me for the moment.
He even doesn't see me to eat this..

Made in china but my dog have been eating this for over 2 years and he's still very healthy!
I really like this product.  I would not say it tastes like Honey Nut Cheerio's.  I would say it has more of a corn taste.  I like it because it is not really really sweet, it is just right.

My terrier mix is a very picky eater, so we have tried almost every one of the higher quality dog foods out there and my dog likes this best. This is also one of the best made dog foods in my opinion. 70% meat and zero grain. The only thing was figuring out the correct amount to feed her each day. As this is a very high protein food(42%), the portions we feed are half of "normal" protein food. My dog is very active, so she has no problem burning off the high calorie count of this food(almost 500 cal per cup). So even though the cost per bag is high, it is really no more expensive than "normal" brands in the long run. Watch for weight gain in larger dogs, my friend tried this stuff with his big Lab mix and he put on to much weight. My only complaint would be that my dogs coat doesnt seem to shine like it did with some other brands. I now top this food off with a squirt of salmon oil and her coat really shines. The best thing about this food is that my dog just loves the taste. I would recommend trying.
Doing very well after several months in the office, great addition.  Plus the bonsai is easy to trim and keep tidy.  Make great lasting gifts.

I'm using these sprinkles for resin so I cannot comment on the taste or how they would stand up in baking.

I use these inside my resin pieces to add cuteness and they work great. They are brightly colored and I love that they come in such a large package. These will last me a while.
it was a gift for a friend she loved it!!she told me she will not share with anyone including her own son oh well

I first tasted these at a little wine shop in Massachusetts.  I immediately went home and ordered a bag on Amazon.  My favorite flavor is the celtic sea salt.  Some sweet...some salt...a smooth creamy feel with a little salt crunch.  Oh so amazing.  My son loves them, my friends love them.....we are totally addicted!  You must try these!

I really wanted my kids to love it: these are very convenient on the go and should be delicious... or so it seemed. Unfortunately, none of the kids cared for it -- it tastes like stage 1 baby food (very bland) and is very runny too, so it can get quite messy if you squeeze a little too hard or if the child drops it.

Summary: Average canned coffee drink made with quality ingredients
Text: The Illy Issimo canned coffee is a decent tasting coffee beverage, not stale or acidic tasting, but not flavorful or fresh enough for my tastes. I enjoy Cappuccino that is very robust and rich, but this drink tasted similar to the many average tasting canned coffee drinks on the market.  The cappuccino taste is very sweet with a hint of chocolate and milky flavors, but not rich and creamy (the way I like Cappuccinos).  There is also 18 grams of sugar, and the can is only 8.45 ounces.  The caffeine and energy I received from the drink was respectable, similar to a regular cup of coffee.  I do like the fact that the drink is Kosher certified, made with real cocoa powder and sugar (not high fructose corn syrup).  The beverage is also and not made from milk containing rBST.  Unfortunately, the product's taste falls short compared to some of the better canned coffee beverages I have tried.

The GU Mandarin Orange Energy Packet is an excellent suppliment for long bike rides.  Small, convenient, and easy to carry.  Very easy to open, tastes good, no mess, and packet can be discarded or stored in riding jersey for trash later.  Highly recommend when you need the boost on your ride.

This made us sick. Perhaps we got a bad batch. We won't purchase this again and would not recommend it.
Would like to add that Amazon Customer service was awesome in our correspondence with this product!
Currently our preferred morning coffee. Not too strong, not too light and all the flavor one needs. We also buy the K-Cups for daily use. Good everyday coffee.
i want to try these  (but not for $15) lower the price and maybe i'll buy and try them out for me myself and others

I'm pregnant, and for whatever reason am feeling constantly thirsty.  This was an absolute blessing.  The additives don't leave too strange a taste, and I found it very hydrating--it's nice to have something quench my thirst. The bottle size is great, making this the sort of all-day bottle you can take wherever.  Very impressed with the product.

We bought ours in Barcelona, Spain. It's amazingly GOOD, as Sasha reports! Dark, creamy. We made ours strong, and added a tsp of sugar. Mmmm. Now I am searching for another jar on line.... I have not found it in any store here in the US (yet?)
I just paid $3.00 for the 6 oz tin so watch the pricing....you can still get it for a bit cheaper here but only if you purchase the large multi pack

Summary: Did Not Receive What We Ordered
Text:
Sellers image does not match item they shipped to us. We had purchased this exact catnip from a local Pet Smart in the large plastic cylinder container identical to the image displayed by the seller on Amazon. When we received our shipment - it came in a small plastic bag.

This item is not as advertised - 1. By the image 2. By the weight

Quite tasty and very sugary. Reminded me of the crusty edge of a pan of brownies, dry and crumbly instead of moist and chewy. Unlike a previous reviewer, I did not find it lacking in chocolaty flavor. I did find however that it is hard to only eat 3, the serving size. The price at Marshalls is much more reasonable so I would suggest checking there first.

My grandmother (who immigrated from England a lot of years ago) would always bring with her on a visit to us a box or more of 'Callard & Bowser' candies that she got stateside. She said as a young girl in England, she would always get these as a treat! As I recall, they were more of a butterscotch than a toffee, but they too were made with butter and were VERY good!! Well, unfortunately, Callard & Bowser are no more...why Nestle, why?? Well ,anyway, I bought these hoping to get a 'little bit of heaven' from the Walker Treacle Toffees.  I did, I did! They aren't the same as the C&B candies, but they are in the same league! I love these, and it is very difficult to not eat more than one should! I highly recommend them! Just a footnote: they have a stronger flavor due to the Treacle or molasses in them.  They really are oh so good tho'...

These cookies are always my favorite. They taste just like Famous Amos cookies! However, when I ordered them from amazon every other bag was stale even within the expiration date the taste was not the same. I was super dissapointed and it even prevented me from ever buying these again.

I have tried all the Via blends, and my favorite by far is still Starbucks Tribute. It was so sad when they ran out last year. My back-up is the Columbian, always good, but I have always loved Sumatra. The cherry is a note, and does not come across as a 'flavor'. I do not like flavored coffee. I heat this in the microwave for two minutes in a mug of 1% organic milk. Yummy!

Starbucks writes: . . . "Spicy & Cherry" and "With beans from all three of the world's coffee-growing regions . . . Aged Sumatra, sun-dried beans from Ethiopia, and coffees from Papua New Guinea and Colombia come together to create this spicy and full-bodied blend with dark cherry notes."

I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!

Summary: 6 month old vomits after eating this
Text: My sweet 6 month old might have food allergies - he's thrown this up about three times now (last time I'll try with this.) He's been exclusively breastfed until now, and I've introduced sweet potato, pears, applesauce, squash, carrots and mixed veggies with no drama. I've noticed that this ceral not only contains rice, but soy, tuna, and pork-based gelatin. Going to a pediatric allergist tomorrow to check out what's going on. Poor baby! Would love to hear if anyone else has a similar story.
A banana or an apple, some yogurt and one of these bars...it's a filling, quick meal for super hectic days. Healthy and won't break the bank. Highly recommend these bars.

I admit that I still haven't figured out what this cheese might be "ideal" for, but I'm guessing roast beef sandwiches (haven't tried that yet). I really liked it. Although I dislike "hot" spicy foods, featuring ingredients such as chilis or cumin, I do find that I can enjoy those "cool" spicy foods like horseradish and wasabi. To me, while they have a bite, they also seem to have a bit of a fresh breeze quality to them. I suppose these spices help to clear the breathing passages.

In any event - this is essentially a very mild cheese, with a mild horseradish effect (not so bland that you can't taste it, but not overwhelming). I've had this cheese by itself on rye flatbread, which is an appealing and satisfying snack; on oatcakes (crackers) - again, very tasty and filling; and also with salmon salad on rye flatbread, which it suited very well. I think this is a good cheese for using with fish because of the horseradish.

The cheese is firmish, but not hard, crumbly or "snappy" - it cuts with a bit of a soft folding quality when at room temperature. It has a very nice, creamy, even texture, is not mushy or sticky or otherwise unpleasant. It seemed very fresh and the horseradish taste was very fresh and natural as well - there is no weird chemical effect or aftertaste - all in all very nicely done.

I usually try to glance at the ingredients list before posting about food products but I'm relieved to see that someone else has already verified that this contains no overt MSG (though the purveyors of chemical additives have a million euphemisms for it in an attempt to continue selling MSG).

This cooks up in about half an hour, total time. Preparation is simple. Although the ingredients to be added list ground beef, I find that sausage works better. Still, I tried it with ground beef and if anything can make that boring staple edible, it's in this box.

As you might expect, it's spicy, so I didn't even bother giving it to the kids. Their taste in food is limited, bland and boring. I am just done with having to settle for mac-n-bleah or rice-a-bleah anywhere on the plate so I cooked this for my wife and myself last night. I will be picking up more of this Tony Chachere's Dirty Rice even if I have to cook a batch and eat the leftovers for breakfast, lunch and dinner the next day. Matter of fact, I think I'll heat up some of last night's leftovers right now! Mmmmmmm!
Don't confuse this with the Sriracha chili sauce that comes in a squeeze bottle.  This is more of a paste in texture, which a much more potent and robust taste.

My dog goes crazy when she sees me getting these out! They are healthy treats , and clean her teeth too. They are 18 in a pack for the small treats , so they go a long way. I research extensivley before I give my girl anything , I give her only healthy food and treats. I feel good about giving her these. They aren't a hard treat , say like pig ears. They are softer and they digest good. They don't break off in little pieces that can splinter. They are more of a hard but chewy treat. I highly reccomend them!
This company has great customer service and quality products. I always receive my shipment quickly and they always call afterwards to make sure it has arrived. Wonderful price!
tastes and looks just like real cotton candy. and it lasts a while. ill buy some ina few months when i run out

If you are used to an organic water processed french roast decaf, don't try this coffee!!  I tried the Eight OClock Decaf beans based on good reviews here (and elsewhere admittedly) and was completely disappointed.  I felt that it lacked taste, body, aroma and that it had what I can only describe as a slightly bitter, metallic taste.  I drink my coffee black with no milk or sugar.  I guess coffee really is an individual thing!

After reading all the rave reviews about Nielsen-Massey vanilla, I purchased the 32 oz. for my Thanksgiving pie baking and Christmas cookie baking.  I must say I was disappointed, and feel that the vanilla I purchase at Sam's Club is just as good or perhaps better.  This didn't add anything extra to any of my baked goods, but didn't hurt them either.  I would say it's just another vanilla, but way overpriced.  I won't be buying it again.

OK so pretzels are supposed to be salty, but these are a tad too salty.  They also have a burnt flavor.  You could say this is a distinctive smokey flavor, but 12 bags ahead of you with the prospects of an unsatisfied pallett is a mighty tall order.  On the other hand the subtle sweet flavors are good.  This is not your ordinary pretzel try them in safety first (instead of buying 12 bags).  Also note grocery items cannot be returned to Amazon!
I love this cereal, and eat it daily.  I used to buy the Vanilla Creme variety and add strawberries for a strawberry shortcake flavor.  Now, I just buy these instead!  Definitely recommend.
These are some of the best anchovies I have ever eaten. They are very flavorful, not too salty, and uniformly trimmed and packed.

I have been taking these pills because I am breastfeeding and wanted to increase my supply. The price on Amazon.com is GREAT! I will always come back here to order online instead of going to my local health store.

Summary: Good to have on a long hot motorcycle ride
Text:
I figured a 450-mile mid-August motorcycle ride would be a good way to evaluate Essentia 9.5 pH Drinking Water, so I poured a bottle of it into my CamelBak and set off from my home in northeast Arkansas for Indianapolis and the MotoGP races last Thursday morning.
The stuff kept me well hydrated and clear-headed all the way to Indy, which was a very good thing because we were overtaken by torrential rains just as we reached the city and had to negotiate flooding streets and rush-hour traffic to reach our motel, which wasn't where we remembered it because the interchange has been reconfigured.
Throughout it all, I never felt the "out of it" fatigue that goes with dehydration on a hot day. It's also easier on my stomach than regular tap water or ordinary bottled water.
Essentia will be my water of choice for future hot weather rides.

Summary: Great Value for a LOT of M&Ms
Text:
What can I say..Amazon does it again...A huge amount of M&M's for a very small price.
What makes this a good deal as well is that they are all the individually wrapped M&M packages.
These are a great size for snacks, desserts, etc. where you don't want to sit and eat 300 of them...

This was a big shocker. I got one a piece for my two dogs. They went absolutely nuts over these things, as if they were getting a hot dog. I used to buy them all the time until we left the toys behind on a vacation. The dogs loved the jerky rings but not so much the cornstarch rings. I would put the cornstarch rings on the outside and the jerky rings on the inside. Somehow they would eat the jerky completely without touching the cornstarch.

Its a good toy and treat to keep them busy and out of trouble. The treats a fairly cheap as well as the toy. These might be a bit big for small dogs but I strongly recommend them. Great treat/toy.

Great product.
Highly recommended for the folks - who wanna have high fiber in the diet.

Summary: Not as satisfied...package was diff when product arrived
Text:
I got sold on the product when I read the review and hope the only reason for the review was that people all over the world have different taste.

The tea arrived in a package which does not match the picture...that's not a good start.

The side of the package was not sealed and thus I believe the aroma compromised. I wish I had not purchased the tea from China Mist

I actually tried another tea store in NY, Ito En. They have an online store too, which you may want to try. I would easily give it five stars or more

Summary: I wish I could actually drink this stuff--it is impossible to palate.
Text:
I've tried on 3 separate occasions to down this stuff and literally vomitted this and everything else I'd had all day up within minutes of drinking this.
I can't believe ANYONE can find this even doable--It tastes like dirt and burns going down-never experienced anything this revolting in my life and I had such high hopes for this product.
On another note, I tried the chocolate and orange creamsicle of Amazing Grass Superfood and I gotta say-night and day difference, no problems drinking either one of those.
I hate that I bought the bigger can of this wheatgrass powder and now I can't even return it.

This is the first solid food my daughter (4 months 3 weeks) went wild for!  She loved the taste, but previous reviewers are right about this not tasting like an actual banana.  I'm just excited about finally finding a first food she loves!

I bought these for my 12 month old son. He loves blueberries so I thought these would be great to have on the go or when we don't have fresh berries to eat. They're a little crunchy then the other kinds they make, and do stain your hands, but they still taste great.

I was excited to mix this right away.  Reviews are saying smoothies and such but there is no limit to what you can cook with this amazing powdered product.  I feel as though the home cook has just been given a token!  A secret ingredient in one's pantry.  Begin by adding it to indian dishes.
This is all I drink out of my Keurig, very strong and tasty and wakes you right up.  Plus the design is very catchy too.

This particular food item left a lot to be desired. The powdered cheese left a very bad after taste. I will not be purchasing this item again. The only positive plug I shall give is that the serving size is generous.

As background, I have had my Tassimo Coffeemaker for over a year and use it daily. My favorite use is a final cup of coffee in the evening after dinner. Rather than make an entire pot, the T-Disc permit a freshly brewed single cup.

Although I am not a total fanatic, when making a full pot, I do grind coffee beans just before brewing coffee, use filtered water, and keep everything quite clean in order to obtain the best taste possible. My preference is strong bold coffee. When it comes to T-Discs I normally stick with Starbucks Africa Kitamu Coffee (Bold), 12-Count T-Discs for Tassimo Coffeemakers (Pack of 2) [Amazon Frustration-Free Packaging] and Starbucks Caffe Verona Coffee (Bold), 12-Count T-Discs for Tassimo Coffeemakers (Pack of 2) [Amazon Frustration-Free Packaging]. Of course, the difference between what one person thinks is good and another thinks is drek, is, well, a matter of taste.

After dinner, I've often reached my caffeine limit for the day. Currently, there are only two decaffeinated T-Discs available -- Maxwell House and Gevalia. Normally I probably would not buy Maxwell House coffee but after plowing through a free sampler pack of Gevalia T-discs that was included with my Tassimo, I found the taste too harshly acidic. Perhaps with cream and sugar it is improved? I don't know, but since I drink my coffee black, it's irrelevant.

I find the Maxwell House disc to be smooth and surprisingly good. I realize that different notes in coffee appeal to different palates, so keep that in mind. I certainly hope the future brings other decaffeinated varieties to choose from, but for the time being, I am quite happy.

Summary: If there were no other coffee in the house
Text: ...I will drink this if all other coffee options are exhausted. The coffee has a vanilla/coconut smell but after a sip or two, I can't drink it. Would not purchase again and I'm having trouble even giving it away. I expected more from Wolfgang Puck.

I eat these snaps by the pound, everyday, all day. Anything ginger tastes good to me. I'm signing up for the auto-ship, otherwise I'd make umpteen trips to the store. Finding a cookie with unsulphured molasses is difficult & a requirement for me - I'm anaphylactic to sulphur.
My husband is now munching them too, so I'll have to double my order!
Thanks Mi-Del! :)
Kristina

Summary: The bags were damaged with holes and stains.
Text:
The chips were great...for the first few bags. However, after the first bag or two, I noticed that the remaining bags were damaged. There were holes in each bag and black, sticky stains on the outside. Other reviewers who bought around the same time that I did are now claiming that they found rodent holes in their bags of chips.

The chips came in a sealed Kettle box, so it's hard to say who screwed up. But someone somewhere screwed up. These chips were a health hazard before the holes in the bag. Now? It's like a game of roulette.

Summary: Sugary sweetness completely overpowers the tropical fruit flavor
Text: These gummies are far less chewy than any other gummy I've ever had and they were outright sugary.  I don't know if I happened on a bad batch, or if Haribo's Tropi-Frutti gummies are meant to be so sugary and less chewy, and I'm not talking sugary as a person who prefers less sugar, I'm talking sugary as in the amount of sugar completely over powers the fruit flavor.  I won't be buying these again, especially since Haribo makes so many other wonderful gummies.

I am such a fan of corazonas tortilla chips, and of all the different flavors, this one is by far my favorite. They taste so good I usually eat them without a dip.  Now the craziest part is that these chips are healthier than most - they contain whole grains and have cholesterol lowering ingredients. They are healthier and taste better, which makes them a win win in my book!
I can't have gluten, and I was amazed at how good these larabars are! Wholesome ingredients: just dates, peanuts, and a touch of sea salt. And they are incredibly good!

Summary: way too weak for my tastes
Text:
What can i say, I love iced tea. I drink a lot of it, and love the convenience of these new individual serving size packets. I am also a big fan of Stash products, or rather of all the other stash products I have tried.
I purchased a case of all 4 varieties, (when i say i drink iced tea, i am not kidding) and these were all way too weak when i mixed them in my 16 ounces water bottle.
I finally found that i needed to dissolve 2 packets in a small bit of hot water first (if not the tea clumped on me), and than add a packet of sweetener before adding the rest of the water just to make these palatable.
Over all I am very dissatisfied with the product and will stick with the other brands that are out on the market.

Summary: VERY GOOD, A NEW PANTRY STAPLE
Text:
The noodle itself was clean, bland, and fresh in flavor. The fishy odor in the packing liquid rinsed off quickly and completely.

To prepare I drained the packing liquid then filled the package with warm tap water and poured it off three times.
